  8820                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8821                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8822                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8823                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8824                                  
  8825                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8826                                  
  8827                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8828                                  
  8829                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8830                                  
  8831                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8832                                  
  8833                                  ;************************************************************************
  8834                                  ;*									*
  8835                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8836                                  ;*									*
  8837                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8838                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8839                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8840                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8841                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8842                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8843                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8844                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8845                                  ;*									*
  8846                                  ;************************************************************************
  8847                                  
  8848                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8849                                  		;db 0
  8850                                  
  8851                                  		; 13/12/202
  8852 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8853                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8854 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8855                                  					; 00 init
  8856 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8857 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8858 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8859                                  					; 03
  8860 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8861                                  					; 04
  8862 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8863                                  					; 05
  8864 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8865 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8866                                  					; 07
  8867 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8868                                  					; 08
  8869 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8870 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8871                                  con_table_end:
  8872 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8873                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8874 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8875 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8876 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8877 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8878 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8879                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8880 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8881                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8882 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8883 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8884 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8885 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8886 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8887 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8888 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8889 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8890 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8891 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8892 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8893 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8894 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8895 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8896 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8897 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8898 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8899 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8900 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8901 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8902                                  prn_table_end:
  8903 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8904                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8905 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8906 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8907 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8908 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8909 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8910 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8911 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8912 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8913 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8914 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8915 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8916                                  aux_table_end:
  8917 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8918                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8919 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8920 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8921 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8922 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8923 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8924 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8925 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8926 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8927 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8928 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8929                                  tim_table_end:
  8930                                  
  8931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8932                                  
  8933                                  ;************************************************************************
  8934                                  ;*									*
  8935                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8936                                  ;*									*
  8937                                  ;************************************************************************
  8938                                  
  8939                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8940                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8941 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8942                                  con_loop:				
  8943 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8944 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8945 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8946                                  con_exit:				
  8947 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8948 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8949                                  
  8950                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8951                                  
  8952                                  ;************************************************************************
  8953                                  ;*									*
  8954                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8955                                  ;*									*
  8956                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8957                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8958                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8959                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8960                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8961                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8962                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8963                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8964                                  ;*									*
  8965                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8966                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8967                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8968                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8969                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8970                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8971                                  ;*									*
  8972                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8973                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8974                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8975                                  ;*									*
  8976                                  ;************************************************************************
  8977                                  
  8978                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8979                                  chrin:		
  8980 00000165 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8981 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8982 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8983 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8984 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8985 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8986 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8987 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8988 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8989 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8990 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8991 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8992                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8993                                  
  8994                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8995                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8996                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8997                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8998                                  ;      else
  8999                                  ;	 set al to zero
  9000                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  9001                                  ;      endif
  9002                                  ;    endif
  9003                                  ;  endif
  9004                                  
  9005                                  alt_ext_chk:
  9006 00000182 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  9007 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  9008 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  9009 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  9010 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  9011 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  9012 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9013 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  9014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9015                                  
  9016                                  not_ext:				
  9017 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  9018 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  9019                                  alt_save:				
  9020 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  9021                                  keyret:					
  9022 0000019D C3                      		retn
  9023                                  
  9024                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9025                                  
  9026                                  ;************************************************************************
  9027                                  ;*									*
  9028                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  9029                                  ;*									*
  9030                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  9031                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  9032                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  9033                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  9034                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  9035                                  ;*									*
  9036                                  ;************************************************************************
  9037                                  
  9038                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9039                                  con_rdnd:				
  9040 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  9041 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9042 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9043 000001A5 8A26[DF04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  9044 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9045 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  9046 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  9047 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9048 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9049                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9050 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  9051                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  9052 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9053 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  9054 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  9055 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  9056                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  9057                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  9058                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  9059                                  z_bus_exit:				
  9060 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  9061 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  9062 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  9063                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9064                                  
  9065                                  gotchr:					
  9066 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9067 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  9068 000001CE 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  9069 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9070 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  9071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9072                                  
  9073                                  notbrk:					
  9074 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9075 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  9076 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  9077 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  9078                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9079                                  
  9080                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  9081 000001DF 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  9082 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  9083 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  9084 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9085 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  9086 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  9087 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  9088                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  9089                                  rdexit:					
  9090 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9091 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  9092                                  					; return keyboard character here
  9093                                  bc_exvec:				
  9094 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  9095                                  					; indicate normal termination
  9096 000001FA C3                      		retn
  9097                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9098                                  
  9099                                  ;************************************************************************
  9100                                  ;*									*
  9101                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  9102                                  ;*									*
  9103                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  9104                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  9105                                  ;*									*
  9106                                  ;************************************************************************
  9107                                  
  9108                                  con_writ:
  9109                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  9110 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  9111                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9112                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  9113                                  con_lp:					
  9114 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  9115 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  9116 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  9117                                  					; AL = character to display
  9118 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  9119                                  cc_ret:					
  9120 00000205 F8                      		clc
  9121 00000206 C3                      		retn
  9122                                  
  9123                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9124                                  
  9125                                  ;************************************************************************
  9126                                  ;*									*
  9127                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  9128                                  ;*									*
  9129                                  ;************************************************************************
  9130                                  
  9131                                  con_flush:
  9132 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  9133                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  9134 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9135 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  9136                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  9137                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  9138                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  9139 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  9140 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9141 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  9142                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  9143 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  9144                                  
  9145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9146                                  
  9147                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9148                                  
  9149                                  ;************************************************************************
  9150                                  ;*									*
  9151                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  9152                                  ;*									*
  9153                                  ;************************************************************************
  9154                                  
  9155                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  9156                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  9157                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  9158                                  
  9159                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  9160                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  9161                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  9162                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  9163                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  9164                                  ;
  9165                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  9166                                  
  9167                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9168                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  9169                                  
  9170                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9171                                  
  9172                                  ;************************************************************************
  9173                                  ;*									*
  9174                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  9175                                  ;*									*
  9176                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  9177                                  ;*									*
  9178                                  ;************************************************************************
  9179                                  
  9180                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  9181 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  9182                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  9183                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9184                                  prn_done:
  9185 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  9186 0000021C C3                      		retn
  9187                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9188                                  
  9189                                  ;************************************************************************
  9190                                  ;*									*
  9191                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  9192                                  ;*									*
  9193                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  9194                                  ;*									*
  9195                                  ;************************************************************************
  9196                                  
  9197                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  9198                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  9199 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  9200                                  prn_loop:				
  9201 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  9202                                  prn_out:				
  9203 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9204 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  9205 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  9206 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9207 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  9208 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  9209 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  9210 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  9211 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  9212 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  9213 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  9214                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9215                                  
  9216                                  _prnwf:					
  9217 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  9218 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  9219                                  TestPrnError:				
  9220 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  9221 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  9222                                  pmessg:					
  9223 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9224                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9225                                  
  9226                                  prn_con:				
  9227 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  9228 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  9229                                  ;prn_done:				
  9230                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9231                                  prn_done2:
  9232                                  		;clc
  9233                                  		; cf=0
  9234 0000024D C3                      		retn
  9235                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9236                                  
  9237                                  ;************************************************************************
  9238                                  ;*									*
  9239                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  9240                                  ;*									*
  9241                                  ;************************************************************************
  9242                                  
  9243                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  9244 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  9245 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  9246 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  9247                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  9248                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9249 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  9250 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9251                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9252                                  
  9253                                  ;************************************************************************
  9254                                  ;*									*
  9255                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  9256                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  9257                                  ;*									*
  9258                                  ;************************************************************************
  9259                                  
  9260                                  prnstat:				
  9261 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  9262                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  9263                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  9264                                  					; Return: AH = status
  9265                                  
  9266                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9267                                  
  9268                                  ;************************************************************************
  9269                                  ;*									*
  9270                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  9271                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  9272                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  9273                                  ;*									*
  9274                                  ;************************************************************************
  9275                                  
  9276                                  prnop:	
  9277 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  9278 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  9279                                  
  9280                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  9281                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  9282                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  9283                                  
  9284 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  9285 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  9286 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  9287 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  9288 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  9289 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  9290 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  9291                                  
  9292                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  9293                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  9294                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  9295                                  
  9296                                  NextTest:				
  9297 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  9298                                  					; i/o error?
  9299 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  9300                                  
  9301                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  9302                                  
  9303 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  9304                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  9305 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  9306 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  9307 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  9308                                  ret1:					
  9309 00000281 C3                      		retn
  9310                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9311                                  
  9312                                  checknotready:				
  9313 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  9314 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  9315 00000287 C3                      		retn
  9316                                  
  9317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9318                                  
  9319                                  ;************************************************************************
  9320                                  ;*									*
  9321                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  9322                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  9323                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  9324                                  ;*									*
  9325                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  9326                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  9327                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  9328                                  ;*									*
  9329                                  ;************************************************************************
  9330                                  
  9331                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9332                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  9333 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  9334                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  9335 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  9336 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  9337 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9338 0000028E 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9339 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9340                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  9341 00000294 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9342 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  9343                                  prn_getstat:				
  9344 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9345 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  9346 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  9347 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  9348 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  9349 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  9350 000002A6 26                      		es
  9351 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  9352                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  9353                                  					; lodsb
  9354 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9355 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  9356 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  9357 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  9358                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9359                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  9360                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  9361 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  9362                                  
  9363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9364                                  
  9365                                  prn_bperr:				
  9366 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  9367                                  prn_berr:				
  9368 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9369                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9370                                  
  9371                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9372                                  
  9373                                  ;************************************************************************
  9374                                  ;*									*
  9375                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  9376                                  ;*									*
  9377                                  ;************************************************************************
  9378                                  
  9379                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  9380                                  ; 11/01/2019
  9381                                  
  9382                                  ;********************************;*
  9383                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  9384                                  ;********************************;*
  9385                                  
  9386                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  9387                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  9388                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  9389                                  
  9390                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  9391                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  9392                                  ;;endstruc
  9393                                  
  9394                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  9395                                  
  9396                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9397                                  
  9398                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9399                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  9400 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  9401 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  9402                                  					; ioc_pc
  9403 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  9404                                  
  9405                                  prnfuncerr:				
  9406 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  9407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9408                                  
  9409                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  9410 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  9411 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  9412 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9413                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  9414 000002CE 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9415 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9416                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  9417 000002D4 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9418 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  9419 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  9420 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  9421 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  9422 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  9423                                  prngetcount:				
  9424                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  9425 000002E3 898F[E104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  9426 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  9427                                  					; return current retry count
  9428                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9429                                  		; cf=0
  9430                                  		;clc
  9431 000002EA C3                      		retn
  9432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9433                                  
  9434                                  ;************************************************************************
  9435                                  ;*									*
  9436                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  9437                                  ;*									*
  9438                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  9439                                  ;************************************************************************
  9440                                  
  9441                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  9442 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  9443 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  9444                                  					; ioc_pc
  9445 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  9446 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  9447 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  9448 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  9449 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  9450 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  9451                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  9452                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9453                                  		; cf=0		
  9454                                  		;clc
  9455 00000302 C3                      		retn

  9457                                  
  9458                                  prn_query_err:
  9459                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  9460                                  		;stc
  9461 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  9462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9463                                  
  9464                                  ;************************************************************************
  9465                                  ;*									*
  9466                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9467                                  ;*									*
  9468                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9469                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9470                                  ;*									*
  9471                                  ;************************************************************************
  9472                                  
  9473                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9474                                  
  9475                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9476                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9477                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9478                                  
  9479                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9480                                  
  9481                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9482                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9483                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9484                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9485                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9486                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9487                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9488                                  
  9489                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9490                                  
  9491                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9492                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9493                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9494                                  
  9495                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9496                                  
  9497                                  ;************************************************************************
  9498                                  ;*									*
  9499                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9500                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9501                                  ;*									*
  9502                                  ;************************************************************************
  9503                                  
  9504                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9505                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9506 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9507 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9508 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9509 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9510 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9511 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9512                                  aux1:					
  9513 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9514                                  					; won't return if error
  9515                                  aux2:					
  9516 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  9517 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9518                                  exvec2:					
  9519 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9520                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9521 0000031A C3                      		retn
  9522                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9523                                  
  9524                                  ;************************************************************************
  9525                                  ;*									*
  9526                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9527                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9528                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9529                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9530                                  ;*									*
  9531                                  ;************************************************************************
  9532                                  
  9533                                  auxin:					
  9534 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9535 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  9536 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9537                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9538                                  		;retn
  9539                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9540 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9541                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9542                                  
  9543                                  arbad:					
  9544 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9545 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9546 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9547 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9548                                  
  9549                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9550                                  
  9551                                  ;************************************************************************
  9552                                  ;*									*
  9553                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9554                                  ;*									*
  9555                                  ;************************************************************************
  9556                                  
  9557                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9558 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  9559 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9560 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9561 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9562 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9563 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9564 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9565 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9566 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9567 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9568 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9569                                  auxdrx:					
  9570 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9572                                  
  9573                                  auxbus:					
  9574 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9575                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9576                                  
  9577                                  ;************************************************************************
  9578                                  ;*									*
  9579                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  9580                                  ;*									*
  9581                                  ;************************************************************************
  9582                                  
  9583                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
