 10743 000006A1 EBE8                    		jmp	short getret
 10744                                  
 10745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10746                                  
 10747                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10748                                  
 10749                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10750                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
 10751                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
 10752                                  ;
 10753                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
 10754                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10755                                  
 10756                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10757                                  
 10758                                  readbootsec:	
 10759 000006A3 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
 10760 000006A5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
 10761 000006A8 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
 10762 000006AB 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
 10763 000006AD 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 10764                                  
 10765                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 10766                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 10767                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 10768                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 10769                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 10770                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 10771                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 10772                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 10773                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 10774                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 10775                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 10776                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 10777                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 10778                                  		; informations
 10779                                  
 10780                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 10781                                  
 10782                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10783                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10784                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10785                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10786                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10787                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10788                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10789                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10790                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10791                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10792                                  
 10793                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10794 000006AF A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 10795 000006B2 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 10796 000006B4 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10797                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 10798 000006B6 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 10799 000006B8 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10800                                  					; no need for nop
 10801 000006BA 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 10802 000006BC 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10803 000006BE 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10804 000006C3 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10805                                  
 10806                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10807                                  ;
 10808                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10809                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10810                                  ;;
 10811                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10812                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10813                                  ;;
 10814                                  ;;check_signature:
 10815                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10816                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10817                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if single sided medium.
 10818                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10819                                  
 10820                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10821                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10822                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10823                                  
 10824                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10825                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10826 000006C5 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10827                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10828 000006C8 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10829 000006C9 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10830 000006CB 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10831 000006CD 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10832 000006CE 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10833                                  
 10834                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10835                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10836                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10837                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10838                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10839                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10840                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10841                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10842                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10843                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10844                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10845                                  
 10846                                  checksinglesided:
 10847                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10848                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10849                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10850 000006D0 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10851 000006D2 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10852 000006D4 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10853 000006D6 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10854 000006D8 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10855 000006DE 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10856 000006E0 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10857 000006E5 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10858                                  
 10859                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10860                                  
 10861                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10862 000006E7 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10863                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10864 000006EC EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 10865                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10866                                  
 10867                                  invalidbootsec:				
 10868 000006EE 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 10869                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10870                                  movbpb_ret:
 10871                                  gooddsk:				
 10872 000006EF F8                      		clc
 10873                                  err_ret:
 10874 000006F0 C3                      		retn
 10875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10876                                  
 10877                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10878                                  ;err_ret:				
 10879                                  		;retn
 10880                                  
 10881                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10882                                  
 10883                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10885                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10886                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10887                                  ;
 10888                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10889                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10890                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10891                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10892                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10893                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10894                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10895                                  
 10896                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10897                                  
 10898                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10899                                  movbpb:	
 10900 000006F1 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 10901                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10902                                  					; sectors per unit
 10903 000006F5 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10904                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10905                                  					; number of directory entries
 10906 000006F9 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10907                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10908                                  					; size of drive
 10909 000006FD 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10910                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10911                                  					; media	descriptor
 10912 00000701 A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10913                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10914                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10915 00000704 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10916                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10917                                  					; sectors per track
 10918 00000708 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10919                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10920                                  					; number of heads
 10921 0000070C 803E[0305]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 10922 00000711 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10923 00000713 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 10924 00000716 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 10925 00000718 C606[0305]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 10926                                  movbpb_conv:				
 10927 0000071D 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 10928 00000722 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10929 00000724 E88511                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
 10930                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10931                                  		; cf = 0
 10932                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
 10933                                  		;clc
 10934 00000727 C3                      		retn
 10935                                  
 10936                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10937                                  
 10938                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10939                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10940                                  ;by es:di.
 10941                                  
 10942                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10943                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10944                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10945                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10946                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10947                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10948                                  
 10949                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10950                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10951 00000728 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10952                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10953                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 10954 0000072D 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 10955 0000072F 51                      		push	cx
 10956 00000730 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 10957                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10958 00000734 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10959 00000738 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10960                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10961 0000073C 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10962 00000740 57                      		push	di
 10963 00000741 56                      		push	si
 10964 00000742 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10965 00000745 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 10966                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 10967                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
 10968 00000748 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 10969 0000074B F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10970                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 10971                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10972 0000074D B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
 10973 0000074F BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
 10974                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
 10975 00000752 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10976 00000755 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10977 00000757 5E                      		pop	si
 10978 00000758 5F                      		pop	di
 10979 00000759 59                      		pop	cx
 10980                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10981                                  		; cf = 0
 10982                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
 10983                                  				; (20/09/2022)
 10984 0000075A C3                      		retn
 10985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10986                                  
 10987                                  mmi_not_ext:				
 10988 0000075B F9                      		stc
 10989 0000075C C3                      		retn
 10990                                  
 10991                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10992                                  
 10993                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10994                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10995                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10996                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10997                                  ; output:
 10998                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10999                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 11000                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 11001                                  
 11002                                  readfat:	
 11003                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 11004                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11005 0000075D 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11006 0000075F B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 11007                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 11008 00000762 E80500                  		call	read_sector
 11009 00000765 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 11010 00000767 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 11011                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 11012 00000769 C3                      		retn
 11013                                  
 11014                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11015                                  
 11016                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11017                                  
 11018                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11019                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 11020                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 11021                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 11022                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 11023                                  ;		dh has head
 11024                                  ;		es:di has bds
 11025                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 11026                                  ;
 11027                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 11028                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 11029                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 11030                                  ;
 11031                                  ;		carry set
 11032                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 11033                                  ;
 11034                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 11035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11036                                  
 11037                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11038                                  
 11039                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11040                                  read_sector:	
 11041 0000076A 55                      		push	bp
 11042 0000076B BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 11043 0000076E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11044 00000772 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 11045                                  rd_ret:					
 11046 00000775 06                      		push	es
 11047 00000776 1E                      		push	ds
 11048 00000777 07                      		pop	es
 11049 00000778 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11050 0000077B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11051                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11052                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11053                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11054 0000077D 07                      		pop	es
 11055 0000077E 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 11056                                  rd_rty:					
 11057 00000780 E86304                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 11058 00000783 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 11059 00000785 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11060                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11061                                  					; fnon_removable
 11062 0000078A 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 11063 0000078C 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11064 00000791 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 11065 00000793 50                      		push	ax
 11066 00000794 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 11067 00000795 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11068                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11069                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11070                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 11071                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11072 00000799 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 11073 0000079B 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 11074                                  		; 
 11075 0000079E 1F                      		pop	ds
 11076 0000079F A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 11077 000007A2 58                      		pop	ax
 11078                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 11079 000007A3 06                      		push	es
 11080 000007A4 1E                      		push	ds
 11081 000007A5 07                      		pop	es
 11082 000007A6 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11083 000007A9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11084                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11085                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11086                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11087 000007AB 07                      		pop	es
 11088 000007AC 9C                      		pushf
 11089 000007AD 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11090 000007B2 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 11091 000007B4 50                      		push	ax
 11092 000007B5 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 11093 000007B8 1E                      		push	ds
 11094 000007B9 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11095 000007BD 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11096 000007C0 1F                      		pop	ds
 11097 000007C1 58                      		pop	ax
 11098                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 11099 000007C2 9D                      		popf
 11100 000007C3 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 11101 000007C5 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 11102                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11103                                  
 11104                                  err_rd_ret:				
 11105 000007C7 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 11106                                  					; return error
 11107 000007C9 F9                      		stc
 11108                                  
 11109                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 11110                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 11111                                  
 11112                                  okret2:					
 11113 000007CA 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 11114 000007CE 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 11115 000007D2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11116                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 11117                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred
 11118 000007D6 9C                      		pushf
 11119 000007D7 E8EC03                  		call	set_tim
 11120 000007DA 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 11121 000007DB 5D                      		pop	bp
 11122 000007DC C3                      		retn
 11123                                  
 11124                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 11128                                  dsk_open:				; 2C7h:80Ah = 70h:2D7Ah

 11153 00000801 C3                      		retn

 11156                                  ;		disk removable routine

 11158                                  
 11159                                  		; al is	unit #
 11160                                  dsk_rem:				; 2C7h:831h = 70h:2DA1h

 11168                                  		;clc			; CF is already ZERO here
 11169                                  					; 15/10/2022
 11170 0000080C C3                      		retn
 11171                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11172

 11228                                  checksingle:
 11229 0000082C 50                      		push	ax
 11230 0000082D 53                      		push	bx

 11232                                  
 11233                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 11234                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 11235

 11239                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 11240 0000083A 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 11241                                  
 11242                                  
 11243                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 11244                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 11245                                  
 11246 0000083C 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11247                                  					; get physical drive number

 11249 00000841 57                      		push	di
 11250 00000842 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 11251                                  scan_list:
 11252 00000846 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 11253 0000084A 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 11254 0000084C B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 11255 0000084E 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 11256 00000852 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 11257 00000854 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 11258 00000858 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 11259 00000859 07                      		pop	es

 11261                                  
 11262                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 11263                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 11264                                  ; in this case.

 11270 0000086C 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 11271                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 11272                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 11273 00000870 06                      		push	es

 11281                                  
 11282                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 11283                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application

 11291 00000888 88C4                    		mov	ah, al

 11344                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11345                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 11346                                  ;
 11347                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 11348                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 11349                                  ;	cx = sector count
 11350                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 11351                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 11352                                  ;	ds = cs
 11353                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 11354                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 11355                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 11356                                  ;
 11357                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 11358                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code

 11361                                  diskrd:

 11369                                  diskio:

 11376 000008C6 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret

 11378                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in

 11389                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 11390

 11405 000008EE 7714                    		ja	short baddrive
 11406 000008F0 EB16                    		jmp	short sanityok

 11408                                  
 11409                                  sanity32:

 11469                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 11470                                  ; the proper error code.

 11473 00000939 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not

 11478

 11585                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only.
 11586                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.

 12095                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12096                                  ;
 12097                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12098                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12099                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12100                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12101                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12102                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12103                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12104                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 12188                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12189                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12190                                  ;
 12191                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12192                                  ;
 12193                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12194                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12195                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12196                                  ;
 12197                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12198                                  
 12199                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12200                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12201                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12202 00000C23 E8A0F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12203 00000C26 06                      		push	es
 12204 00000C27 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12205 00000C2B 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12206                                  					; RAWIO
 12207 00000C30 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12208 00000C34 07                      		pop	es
 12209 00000C35 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12210                                  
 12211                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12212                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12213                                  
 12214                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12215 00000C37 BE[F40B]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12216                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12217                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12218 00000C3A A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12219 00000C3C 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12220                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12221 00000C3E BE[070C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12222                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12223                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12224                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12225 00000C41 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12226 00000C43 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12227 00000C45 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12228 00000C48 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12229 00000C4A 98                      		cbw
 12230 00000C4B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12231 00000C4D 46                      		inc	si
 12232 00000C4E 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12233 00000C50 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12234                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12235 00000C53 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12236                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12237                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12238 00000C58 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12239 00000C5A C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12240                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12241                                  
 12242                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12243                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12244                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h

 12255                                  ;
 12256                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 12257                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 12258                                  ;

 12260                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header

 12268

 12282

 12486                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12487                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12488                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12489                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12490                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12491                                  ;
 12492                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12493                                  ;
 12494                                  ; output:
 12495                                  ;	for status call:
 12496                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12497                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12498                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12499                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12500                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12501                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12502                                  ;
 12503                                  ;	for format track:
 12504                                  ;		carry set if error
 12505                                  ;

 12660                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12661                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12662                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12663                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12664                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to

 12666                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be

 12668                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 12670                                  		; register.

 12772                                  
 12773                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12774                                  
 12775                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12776                                  
 12777                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12778                                  ;
 12779                                  ; TrackIo:
 12780                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ;   input:
 12783                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12784                                  ;		  3 = write
 12785                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12786                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12787                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12788                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12789                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12790                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12791                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12792                                  ;
 12793                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12794                                  
 12795                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12796                                  		
 12797                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12798                                  TrackIo:	
 12799                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12800 00000ED5 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12801 00000ED9 E850F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12802 00000EDC 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12803                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12804 00000EE1 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12805 00000EE3 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12806 00000EE4 51                      		push	cx
 12807 00000EE5 E8D0FA                  		call	iosetup
 12808 00000EE8 59                      		pop	cx
 12809 00000EE9 58                      		pop	ax
 12810                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12811 00000EEA BE[3205]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12812 00000EED D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12813 00000EEF D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12814 00000EF1 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12815                                  
 12816                                  		; WE WANT:
 12817                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12818                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12819                                  		
 12820 00000EF3 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12821                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12822 00000EF6 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12823                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12824                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12825 00000EFB 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12826                                  		
 12827 00000EFD 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12828                                  ionextsector:				
 12829 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 12830 00000F00 52                      		push	dx
 12831 00000F01 46                      		inc	si
 12832 00000F02 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12833                                  					; the track table
 12834 00000F03 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12835 00000F04 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12836                                  
 12837                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12838                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12839                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12840                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12841                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12842                                  		
 12843                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12844 00000F07 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12845                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12846                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12847 00000F0C 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12848                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12849 00000F0E F606[2605]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12850                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12851                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12852 00000F13 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12853 00000F15 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12854 00000F19 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12855 00000F1B E81CFB                  		call	Disk
 12856 00000F1E 5A                      		pop	dx
 12857 00000F1F 59                      		pop	cx
 12858 00000F20 F8                      		clc
 12859 00000F21 C3                      		retn
 12860                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12861                                  
 12862                                  IoRemovable:				
 12863 00000F22 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12864                                  					; table	and save it
 12865 00000F23 50                      		push	ax
 12866 00000F24 56                      		push	si
 12867 00000F25 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12868 00000F26 50                      		push	ax

 12870                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12871 00000F2B C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12872 00000F2F 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12873 00000F32 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12874 00000F35 58                      		pop	ax
 12875 00000F36 1F                      		pop	ds

 12877 00000F39 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax

 12880                                  					; sector size
 12881                                  		;pop	ax
 12882                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12883 00000F40 59                      		pop	cx
 12884                                  
 12885                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 12886                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 12887                                  		;mov	cl, al	; 24/12/2023
 12888 00000F41 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12889 00000F44 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12890                                  
 12891 00000F46 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12892 00000F48 5A                      		pop	dx
 12893 00000F49 59                      		pop	cx
 12894 00000F4A E2B3                    		loop	ionextsector
 12895 00000F4C 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12896                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12897                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12898 00000F51 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12899 00000F53 E82BFA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12900                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12901                                  NoNeedDone:
 12902 00000F56 F8                      		clc	; not necessary ('done' clears cf) ; 24/12/2023
 12903                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12904 00000F57 C3                      		retn
 12905                                  
 12906                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12907                                  
 12908                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12909                                  ;
 12910                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12911                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12912                                  ; are permissible.
 12913                                  ;
 12914                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12915                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12916                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12917                                  ;

 12947                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12948                                  ;
 12949                                  ; SetDASD
 12950                                  ;
 12951                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12952                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12953                                  ;
 12954                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12955                                  ;
 12956                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12957                                  
 12958                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12959                                  SetDasd:	
 12960 00000F58 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12961                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12962 00000F5D 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12963                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12964 00000F5F 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12965                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12966                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12967 00000F64 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12968                                  		; 10/12/2022

 12971                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12972                                  DoSetDasd:

 12975 00000F75 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12976                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12977 00000F77 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12978 00000F7B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12979                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12980                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB

 12987                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12988                                  		;jz	short GotBig

 12991                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12992                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12999 00000F8C 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 13000                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive

 13003                                  		; 18/12/2022

 13011                                  		; 02/09/2023

 13016                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)

 13025 00000FAA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 13026                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 13027                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 13028 00000FAC 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13029 00000FB0 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 13032                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13033                                  
 13034                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13035                                  
 13036                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13037                                  ;
 13038                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13039                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13040                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13041                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13042                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13043                                  ;
 13044                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13045                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13046                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13047                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13048                                  ;
 13049                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13050                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13051                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13052                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13053                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13054                                  ;
 13055                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13056                                  
 13057                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13058                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13059 00000FB5 51                      		push	cx
 13060 00000FB6 52                      		push	dx
 13061                                  
 13062                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13063                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13064                                  
 13065 00000FB7 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13066 00000FBC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13067 00000FBE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13068 00000FC0 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13069 00000FC5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13070 00000FC7 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13072                                  
 13073                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13074 00000FC9 06                      		push	es
 13075 00000FCA 56                      		push	si
 13076                                  
 13077                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13078                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 13079 00000FCB 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 13080 00000FCD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13081                                  
 13082 00000FCF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13083                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13084                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13085 00000FD4 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13086 00000FD8 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13087                                  
 13088                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 13089                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13090                                  
 13091 00000FDC 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13092 00000FE1 5E                      		pop	si
 13093 00000FE2 07                      		pop	es
 13094                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 13095 00000FE3 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13096 00000FE7 49                      		dec	cx
 13097 00000FE8 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 13098 00000FEB D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13099 00000FED D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13100 00000FEF 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 13101 00000FF1 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13102 00000FF5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13103 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 13104 00000FFA 1E                      		push	ds
 13105 00000FFB 56                      		push	si
 13106 00000FFC 57                      		push	di
 13107 00000FFD B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13108 00000FFF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13109                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13110 00001001 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13111 00001003 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13112 00001008 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13113 0000100A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13114                                  		
 13115                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13116                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13117 0000100B 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13118 0000100D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13119 0000100F 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13120                                  
 13121 00001010 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13122                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13123                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13124 00001015 8936[3106]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 13125 00001019 8C06[3306]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 13126                                  
 13127                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13128                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13129                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 13130                                  		;mov	es, si
 13131 0000101D 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13132                                  
 13133                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 13134 0000101E 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 13135                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 13136 00001023 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 13137 00001028 C606[2F06]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13138                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 13139 0000102D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 13140                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 13141 0000102F A2[3006]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 13142 00001032 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 13143                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13144                                  
 13145                                  FormaStatErr:
 13146                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13147 00001034 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 13148

 13150                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 13151 00001039 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 13152 0000103B 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 13153 0000103E 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 13154                                  		; 10/12/2022

 13156                                  		; 18/12/2022

 13169                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 13170                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 13171                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13172                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 13173                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13174

 13177                                  		; al = 3

 13179                                  					; Media	not present.

 13191                                  
 13192                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13193                                  
 13194                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13195                                  ;
 13196                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13197                                  ;
 13198                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13199                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13200                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13201                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13202                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 13203                                  ;
 13204                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13205                                  
 13206                                  ResetDisk:
 13207 00001049 50                      		push	ax
 13208                                  
 13209                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13210 0000104A B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 13211 0000104D 3806[2F06]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 13212                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13213                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 13214 00001051 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 13215                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 13216                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 13217 00001053 A2[3006]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 13218                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 13219                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 13220                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 13221 00001056 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 13222                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 13223 00001058 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 13224                                  					; Zap up the speed
 13225 0000105D 58                      		pop	ax
 13226 0000105E C3                      		retn

 13228                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13229                                  
 13230                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13231                                  
 13232                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13233                                  ;
 13234                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13235                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13236                                  ;
 13237                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13238                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13239                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13240                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13241                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13242                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13243                                  ;
 13244                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13245                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13246                                  ;
 13247                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13248                                  
 13249                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13250                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13251                                  ToRom:	
 13252 0000105F 53                      		push	bx
 13253 00001060 56                      		push	si
 13254                                  
 13255                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 13256                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 13257                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 13258                                  
 13259 00001061 F606[2F06]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13260 00001066 7534                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 13261 00001068 50                      		push	ax
 13262 00001069 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13263 0000106A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 13264                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 13265                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13266                                  		;pushf	; not necessary	; (Save	the cmp	result)
 13267                                  		
 13268 0000106F 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13269                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 13270 00001073 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13271                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 13272                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	Save pointer to table
 13273 00001078 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13274 0000107C 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13275                                  		
 13276 00001080 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 13277 00001083 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 13278 00001087 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 13279 0000108A 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 13280                                  					; Important for	format
 13281 0000108E 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13282                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 13283                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 13284                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13285                                  		;popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 13286 00001093 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 13287 00001095 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 13288                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 13289 0000109A 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 13290 0000109B 58                      		pop	ax
 13291                                  GotValidDpt:				
 13292 0000109C 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 13293 000010A0 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 13294 000010A2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 13295 000010A6 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 13296 000010AA 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13297 000010AB 8E06[2E05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 13298 000010AF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 13299 000010B1 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 13300 000010B2 5E                      		pop	si
 13301 000010B3 5B                      		pop	bx
 13302 000010B4 C3                      		retn
 13303                                  
 13304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13305                                  
 13306                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13307                                  
 13308                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13309                                  
 13310                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13311                                  ;
 13312                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13313                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13314                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13315                                  ;
 13316                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13317                                  
 13318                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13319                                  ioctl_getown:
 13320 000010B5 E80EF4                  		call	SetDrive
 13321 000010B8 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13322                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13323 000010BC C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13324                                  ownloop:				
 13325 000010C0 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13326 000010C4 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13327                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13328 000010C6 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13329                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13330                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13331 000010CB 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13332                                  getnextBDS:				
 13333 000010CD 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13334 000010D0 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13335                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13336                                  
 13337                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13338                                  ;
 13339                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13340                                  ; in al to al.
 13341                                  ;
 13342                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13343                                  
 13344                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13345                                  ioctl_setown:
 13346 000010D2 E8F1F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13347 000010D5 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13348                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13349 000010DA E84FF7                  		call	checksingle
 13350                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13351 000010DD FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13352                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13353                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13354                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13355                                  
 13356                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13357                                  ;
 13358                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13359                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13360                                  ;
 13361                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13362                                  
 13363                                  exitown:				
 13364 000010E1 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13365                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13366 000010E3 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13367                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13368                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13369 000010E8 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 13370 000010EA 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13371                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13372                                  					; Get it 1-based
