 13440                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13441                                  ;	get media id
 13442                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13443                                  ;
 13444                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13445                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13446                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13447                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13448                                  ;
 13449                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13450                                  ;
 13451                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13452                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13453                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13454                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13455                                  ;
 13456                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13457                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13458                                  ;
 13459                                  ; LOGIC:
 13460                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13461                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13462                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13463                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13464                                  ;
 13465                                  ; {
 13466                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13467                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13468                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13469                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13470                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13471                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13472                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13473                                  ;		};
 13474                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13475                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13476                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13477                                  ;		};
 13478                                  ;	else
 13479                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13480                                  ;
 13481                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13482                                  
 13483                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13484                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13485                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13486                                  
 13487                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13488                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13489                                  GetMediaId:
 13490 00001120 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13491 00001123 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13492 00001127 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13493 0000112C E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13494 0000112F 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13495                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13496 00001131 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13497                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13498                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13499                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13500 00001136 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13501                                  
 13502                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13503 00001138 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13504 0000113B 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13505                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13506                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13507 0000113E 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13508 00001140 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13509 00001144 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13510                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13511 00001148 46                      		inc	si
 13512                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13513                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13514 00001149 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13515                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13516 0000114C B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13517                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13518                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13519 0000114F F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13520                                  	
 13521                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13522                                  		; cf = 0
 13523                                  		;clc
 13524                                  
 13525 00001151 C3                      		retn
 13526                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13527                                  
 13528                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13529                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13530 00001152 F9                      		stc	
 13531                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13532 00001153 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13533                                  		;stc
 13534                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13535                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13536 00001155 C3                      		retn

 13541                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13542                                  ;  set media id
 13543                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13544                                  
 13545                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13546                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13547                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13548                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13549                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13550                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13551                                  ;
 13552                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13553                                  ;
 13554                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13555                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13556                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13557                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13558                                  ;
 13559                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13560                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13561                                  ;
 13562                                  ; logic:
 13563                                  ;
 13564                                  ; {
 13565                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13566                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13567                                  ;	BootIo;
 13568                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13569                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13570                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13571                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13572                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13573                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13574                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13575                                  ;		};
 13576                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13577                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13578                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13579                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13580                                  ;		};
 13581                                  ;	else
 13582                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13583                                  ;
 13584                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13585                                  
 13586                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13587                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13588                                  SetMediaId:
 13589 00001156 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13590 00001159 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13591                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13592 0000115D 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13593 0000115F C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13594 00001164 52                      		push	dx
 13595 00001165 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13596 00001168 5A                      		pop	dx
 13597 00001169 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13598                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13599 0000116B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13600                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13601 00001170 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13602                                  		
 13603 00001172 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13604                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13605                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13606                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13607 00001177 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13608                                  
 13609 00001179 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13610 0000117A 57                      		push	di
 13611 0000117B 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13612 0000117C 07                      		pop	es
 13613 0000117D BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13614 00001180 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13615 00001184 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13616 00001187 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13617                                  
 13618                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13619                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13620                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13621                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13622                                  		;rep movsb
 13623 0000118A E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13624                                  
 13625 0000118D 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13626 0000118E 1F                      		pop	ds
 13627 0000118F 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13628 00001190 07                      		pop	es
 13629 00001191 E894F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13630 00001194 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13631 00001196 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13632 0000119B E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13633 0000119E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13634                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13635                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13636 000011A3 C3                      		retn
 13637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13638                                  
 13639                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13640                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 13641                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13642                                  ;		stc
 13643                                  ;IOCtl_If6:

 13647                                  
 13648                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13649                                  
 13650                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13651                                  ;	BootIo
 13652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13653                                  ;
 13654                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13655                                  ;
 13656                                  ; input :
 13657                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13658                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13659                                  ;
 13660                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13661                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13662                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13663                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13664                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13665                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13666                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13667                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13668                                  ;
 13669                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13670                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13671                                  ;
 13672                                  ; logic:
 13673                                  ;
 13674                                  ; {
 13675                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13676                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13677                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13678                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13679                                  ; }
 13680                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13681                                  
 13682                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13683                                  BootIo:	
 13684 000011A4 06                      		push	es
 13685 000011A5 57                      		push	di
 13686 000011A6 53                      		push	bx
 13687 000011A7 1E                      		push	ds
 13688 000011A8 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13689                                  
 13690                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13691                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13692                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13693                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13694                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13695                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13696                                  
 13697 000011A9 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13698 000011AC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13699 000011AE 8916[2405]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13700 000011B2 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13701 000011B5 E8FEF6                  		call	diskio
 13702 000011B8 5B                      		pop	bx
 13703 000011B9 5F                      		pop	di
 13704 000011BA 07                      		pop	es
 13705 000011BB C3                      		retn
 13706                                  
 13707                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13708                                  
 13709                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13710                                  
 13711                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13712                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13713                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13714                                  ;
 13715                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13716                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13717                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13718                                  ; history in the flags.
 13719                                  ;
 13720                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13721                                  ;
 13722                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13723                                  ;
 13724                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13725                                  ;
 13726                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13727                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13728                                  ;
 13729                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13730                                  
 13731                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13732 000011BC 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13733 000011C0 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13734 000011C2 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13735                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13736 000011C4 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13737                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13738                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13739 000011C9 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13740 000011CB 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13741 000011D0 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13742 000011D2 E8DD06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13743 000011D5 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13744                                  
 13745                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13746                                  
 13747 000011D7 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13748 000011D9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13749                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13750                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13751 000011DB 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13752 000011DD 53                      		push	bx
 13753 000011DE BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13754                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13755                                  					; physical drive
 13756 000011E1 E8A706                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13757 000011E4 5B                      		pop	bx
 13758                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13759 000011E5 C3                      		retn
 13760                                  
 13761                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13762

 13765                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13766                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13767                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13768                                  ;
 13769                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13770                                  ;
 13771                                  ; INPUT :
 13772                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13773                                  ;
 13774                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13775                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13776                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13777                                  
 13778                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13779                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13780 000011E6 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13781 000011EA C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13782                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13783                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13784 000011ED 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13785                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13786 000011EF 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13787                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13788                                  					; unformatted_media
 13789 000011F4 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13790                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13791                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13792 000011F6 40                      		inc	ax
 13793                                  GafDone:
 13794 000011F7 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13795 000011FA C3                      		retn
 13796                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13797                                  
 13798                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13799                                  
 13800                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13801                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13802                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13803                                  ;
 13804                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13805                                  ;
 13806                                  ; input :
 13807                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13808                                  ;
 13809                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13810                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13811                                  
 13812                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13813                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13814 000011FB C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13815 000011FF C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13816                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13817 00001202 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13818                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13819                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13820 00001207 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13821 0000120B 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13822                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13823 0000120D 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13824                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13825                                  					; unformatted_media
 13826                                  saf_Done:				
 13827 00001212 C3                      		retn

 13831                                  
 13832                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13833                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13834                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13835                                  ;
 13836                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13837                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13838                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13839                                  ;
 13840                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13841                                  
 13842                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13843                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13844 00001213 06                      		push	es
 13845 00001214 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13846 00001218 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13847                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13848 0000121C 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13849                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13850 0000121E 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13851 00001220 0E                      		push	cs
 13852 00001221 07                      		pop	es
 13853 00001222 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13854                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13855 00001225 BF[180C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13856                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13857                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13858 00001228 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13859 0000122A F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13860 0000122C 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13861 0000122E B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h

 13865                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13866                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit

 13875                                  nosupport:

 13880                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13881                                  
 13882                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13883                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13884                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13885                                  ;
 13886                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13887                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13888                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13889                                  ;	    drive)
 13890                                  ;
 13891                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13892                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13893                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13894                                  ;
 13895                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13896                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13897                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13898                                  ;
 13899                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13900                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13901                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13902                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13903                                  ;
 13904                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13905                                  ;
 13906                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13907                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13908                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13909                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13910                                  ; 
 13911                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13912                                  
 13913                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13914                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13915 00001237 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13916 0000123B C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13917                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13918                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13919 0000123E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13920 00001240 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13921                                  		;
 13922 00001242 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13923                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13924                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13925                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13926 00001246 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13927                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13928 00001248 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13929 0000124A 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13930 0000124C FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13931                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13932 0000124E FEC8                    		dec	al
 13933 00001250 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13934 00001252 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13935 00001254 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13936 00001256 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13937 00001258 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13938 0000125A 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13939 0000125C 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13940                                  GotMediaType:				
 13941 0000125E 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13942                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13943                                  		; cf = 0
 13944                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13945 00001261 C3                      		retn
 13946                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13947                                  
 13948                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13949 00001262 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13950 00001265 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13951 00001267 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13952 00001269 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13953 0000126C 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13954                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13955 0000126E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13956                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13957 00001270 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13958 00001272 F9                      		stc
 13959 00001273 C3                      		retn
 13960                                  
 13961                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13962                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13963                                  		;db    0
 13964                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13965                                  
 13966                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13967                                  
 13968                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13969                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13970                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13971                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13972                                  
 13973                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13974                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13975                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13976                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13977                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13978                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13979                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13980                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13981                                  ;
 13982                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13983                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13984                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13985                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13986                                  ;
 13987                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13988                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13989                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13990                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13991                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13992                                  ;
 13993                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13994                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13995                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13996                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13997                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13998                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13999                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 14000                                  
 14001                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 14002                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 14003                                  
 14004                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14005                                  
 14006                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 14007 00001274 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 14008 00001277 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 14009 00001279 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 14010 0000127C 7431                    		jz	short mine
 14011                                  
 14012                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 14013                                  
 14014 0000127E 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 14015 00001281 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 14016 00001283 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 14017 00001286 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14018 00001288 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14019                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14020                                  
 14021                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14022 0000128B CF                      		iret
 14023                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14024                                  
 14025                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 14026 0000128C 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 14027 0000128D 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 14028                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 14029                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 14030                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 14031 0000128F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 14032                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14033                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 14034                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 14035                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 14036                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 14037                                  		
 14038                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14039                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 14040 00001294 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 14041                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 14042 00001298 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 14043                                  
 14044                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 14045                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 14046                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 14047                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 14048                                  		
 14049                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 14050                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14051 0000129C 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 14052 000012A0 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 14053                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 14054                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14055 000012A3 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 14056 000012A7 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 14057                                  
 14058 000012AB 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 14059                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14060                                  		;pop	bx
 14061 000012AC 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 14062                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 14063 000012AD 58                      		pop	ax
 14064                                  i2f_iret:
 14065 000012AE CF                      		iret
 14066                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14067                                  
 14068                                  mine:					
 14069 000012AF 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 14070 000012B1 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 14071 000012B3 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 14072 000012B5 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 14073 000012B7 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh

 14100 000012D1 EA[8D08]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 14101                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 14102                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 14103                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 14104                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf

 14108                                  do_subfun_01:				
 14109 000012D6 06                      		push	es

 14129 000012EA C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 14130                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 14131                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 14132                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 14133                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14134 000012EE CF                      		iret
 14135                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14136                                  
 14137                                  ; 17/10/2022
 14138                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14139                                  
 14140                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 14141                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 14142                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 14143                                  
 14144                                  win386call:				
 14145 000012EF 1E                      		push	ds
 14146 000012F0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14147                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14148                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 14149 000012F5 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 14150                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 14151 000012F7 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 14152 000012F9 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 14153                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 14154 000012FB 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 14155                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14156 000012FD F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 14157                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 14158 00001300 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14159                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 14160 00001302 8026[C508]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 14161 00001307 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 14162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14163                                  
 14164                                  Win386Init:	
 14165                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14166 00001309 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 14167                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 14168 0000130C 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14169                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 14170 0000130E 800E[C508]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 14171                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 14172                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 14173 00001313 891E[9308]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 14174 00001317 8C06[9508]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 14175                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 14176 0000131B BB[9108]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 14177 0000131E 1E                      		push	ds
 14178 0000131F 07                      		pop	es
 14179                                  win_iret:
 14180 00001320 1F                      		pop	ds
 14181                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 14182                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 14183                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14184 00001321 CF                      		iret

 14187                                  handle_multmult:			
 14188 00001322 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 14189 00001324 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 14190 00001326 1E                      		push	ds
 14191 00001327 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 14192                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14193                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 14194                                  		;dec	bx
 14195 0000132A BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 14196 0000132D 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 14197 0000132F 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 14198 00001331 F7D3                    		not	bx
 14199 00001333 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 14200 00001335 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 14201 00001337 43                      		inc	bx
 14202                                  try_1:
 14203 00001338 1F                      		pop	ds
 14204                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 14205                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14206 00001339 CF                      		iret
 14207                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14208                                  
 14209                                  try_2:					
 14210 0000133A 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 14211 0000133C 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 14212 0000133E 1E                      		push	ds
 14213                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14214                                  		;xor	di, di
 14215                                  		;dec	di
 14216 0000133F BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 14217 00001342 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 14218 00001344 E82800                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 14219 00001347 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14220 0000134A 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 14221 0000134C F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 14222 0000134E 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 14223 00001350 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 14224                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14225                                  		;sub	di, di

 14228                                  		;jmp	short InsuffHMA
 14229                                  		; 02/09/2023

 14238                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 14239                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14240 0000135E 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 14241                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 14242 00001361 011E[EB08]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 14243 00001365 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA
 14244 00001367 C706[EB08]FFFF          		mov	word [FreeHMAPtr], 0FFFFh ; -1
 14245                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 14246                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped

 14250                                  try_3:

 14255                                  
 14256                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14257                                  ;try_3:					
 14258                                  		;jmp	ii2f_iret
