 15303                                  
 15304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15305                                  
 15306                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15307                                  
 15308                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15309                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15310                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15311                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15312                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15313                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15314                                  
 15315                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15316 00001718 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15317 0000171A 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15317 00001723 736B6574746520666F-
 15317 0000172C 7220647269766520   
 15318                                  
 15319                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15320 00001734 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15320 0000173D 65737320616E79206B-
 15320 00001746 6579207768656E2072-
 15320 0000174F 656164790D0A       
 15321 00001755 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15322                                  
 15323                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15324                                  
 15325                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15326                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15327                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15328                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15329                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15330                                  
 15331                                  chkopcnt:		
 15332 00001757 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15333 0000175C C3                      		retn
 15334                                  
 15335                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15336                                  
 15337                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15338                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15339                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15340                                  ;
 15341                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15342                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15343                                  
 15344                                  mediacheck:	
 15345 0000175D E8CCF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15346 00001760 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15347 00001762 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15348 00001765 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15349 00001767 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15350 0000176A 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15351 0000176C 50                      		push	ax
 15352 0000176D 52                      		push	dx
 15353 0000176E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15354                                  					; set logical drive number
 15355 00001772 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15356 00001774 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15357                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15358                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15359 00001776 5A                      		pop	dx
 15360 00001777 58                      		pop	ax
 15361 00001778 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15362 0000177A BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15363                                  
 15364                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15365                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15366                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15367                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15368                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15369                                  ; status.
 15370                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15371 0000177D 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15372 00001781 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15373                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15374                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15375                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15376                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15377 00001785 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15378                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15379                                  
 15380                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15381                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15382                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15383                                  
 15384 00001787 50                      		push	ax
 15385 00001788 51                      		push	cx
 15386 00001789 52                      		push	dx
 15387 0000178A E8C1ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15388 0000178D 5A                      		pop	dx
 15389 0000178E 59                      		pop	cx
 15390 0000178F 58                      		pop	ax
 15391 00001790 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15392 00001792 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15393                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15394 00001794 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15395                                  mediaret:				
 15396 00001796 C3                      		retn
 15397                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15398                                  
 15399                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15400                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15401                                  ; or write.
 15402                                  
 15403                                  mediadovolid:				
 15404 00001797 E859EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15405 0000179A 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15406 0000179C E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15407 0000179F 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15408 000017A1 E90AF4                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15409                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15410                                  
 15411                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15412                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15413                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15414                                  ; dos.
 15415                                  ;
 15416                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15417                                  
 15418                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15419                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15420                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15421                                  
 15422                                  checklatchio:	
 15423                                  
 15424                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15425                                  			
 15426 000017A4 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15427 000017A7 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15428                                  
 15429                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15430                                  
 15431 000017A9 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15432 000017AC 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15433                                  
 15434                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15435                                  ; expensive verification.
 15436                                  
 15437 000017AE E842EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15438 000017B1 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15439 000017B3 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15440 000017B6 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15441 000017B8 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15442 000017BA 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15443 000017BC E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15444                                  checklatchret:				
 15445 000017BF E8ECF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15446                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15447 000017C2 F9                      		stc
 15448 000017C3 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15449                                  checkret:				
 15450 000017C4 C3                      		retn
 15451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15452                                  
 15453                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15454                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15455                                  ;
 15456                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15457                                  
 15458                                  checkfatvid:				
 15459 000017C5 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15460 000017C8 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15461 000017CA 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15462                                  
 15463                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15464                                  
 15465                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15466                                  
 15467                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15468                                  
 15469                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15470                                  ;
 15471                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15472                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15473                                  ;
 15474                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15475                                  ;
 15476                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15477                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15478                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15479                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15480                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15481                                  ;
 15482                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15483                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15484                                  ; routine.)
 15485                                  ;
 15486                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15487                                  
 15488                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15489                                  check_vid:
 15490                                  
 15491                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15492                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15493                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15494                                  
 15495 000017CC 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15496                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15497                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15498 000017D1 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15499 000017D3 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15500 000017D6 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15501 000017D8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15502 000017DA 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15503                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15504 000017DF 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15505                                  					; if not fat system
 15506 000017E1 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15507 000017E4 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15508 000017E6 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15509 000017E9 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15510                                  					; definitely changed
 15511 000017EC 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15512                                  
 15513 000017EE 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15514                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15515 000017EF E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15516                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15517                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15518                                  		;clc
 15519                                  checkfatret:				
 15520 000017F2 C3                      		retn
 15521                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15522                                  
 15523                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15524                                  changed_drv:
 15525 000017F3 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15526 000017F4 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15527                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15528 000017F9 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15529                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15530                                  
 15531                                  ; extended id check
 15532                                  
 15533                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15534                                  
 15535                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15536                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15537                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15538                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15539                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15540                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15541                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15542                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15543                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15544                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15545                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15546                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15547                                  ;
 15548                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15549                                  
 15550                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15551                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 15552 000017FA 50                      		push	ax
 15553                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15554                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15555 000017FB A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15556                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15557 000017FE 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15558 00001800 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15559 00001804 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15560 00001806 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15561 00001809 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15562 0000180D 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15563                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15564                                  					; don't know
 15565 0000180F 58                      		pop	ax
 15566 00001810 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15567                                  					; reset the flag
 15568                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15569                                  
 15570                                  ext_changed:
 15571 00001812 58                      		pop	ax
 15572                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15573 00001813 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15574                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15575                                  					; disk changed!
 15576                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15577                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15578                                  		;clc
 15579 00001814 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15580                                  
 15581                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15582                                  
 15583                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15584                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15585                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15586                                  ;
 15587                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15588                                  
 15589                                  checkio:				
 15590 00001816 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15591 00001819 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15592 0000181B E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15593 0000181E 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15594 00001820 E8D0ED                  		call	GetBp
 15595 00001823 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15596 00001825 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15597 00001828 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15598 0000182A 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15599 0000182C 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15600 0000182E 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15601 0000182F C3                      		retn
 15602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15603                                  
 15604                                  checkioerr:				
 15605 00001830 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15606                                  
 15607                                  checkioret:				
 15608 00001833 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15609 00001834 E928F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15610                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15611                                  
 15612                                  no_error_map:				
 15613 00001837 E928F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15614                                  
 15615                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15616                                  
 15617                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15618                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15619                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15620                                  
 15621                                  returnvid:		
 15622 0000183A BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15623                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15624 0000183D E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15625 00001840 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15626 00001842 F9                      		stc
 15627 00001843 C3                      		retn
 15628                                  
 15629                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15630                                  
 15631                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15632                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15633                                  ;
 15634                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15635                                  ; **trashes si**
 15636                                  
 15637                                  media_set_vid:				
 15638 00001844 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15639                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15640                                  
 15641                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15642                                  
 15643                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15644                                  
 15645                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15646                                  
 15647                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15648                                  vid_into_packet:
 15649 00001847 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15650 00001848 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15651 0000184C 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15652 0000184F 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15653 00001851 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15654 00001854 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15655 00001857 1F                      		pop	ds
 15656                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15657 00001858 C3                      		retn
 15658                                  
 15659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15660                                  
 15661                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15662                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15663                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15664                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15665                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15666                                  ;
 15667                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15668                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15669                                  ;
 15670                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15671                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15672                                  ;		carry set
 15673                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15674                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15675                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15676                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15677                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15678                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15679                                  ;
 15680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15681                                  
 15682                                  hidensity:
 15683                                  
 15684                                  ; check for correct drive
 15685                                  		
 15686                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15687 00001859 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15688                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15689                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15690 0000185E 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15691                                  
 15692                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15693                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15694                                  
 15695 00001860 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15696 00001865 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15697                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15698                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15699 00001867 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15700 0000186A 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15701                                  
 15702                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15703                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15704                                  
 15705                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15706 0000186C 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15707 00001870 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15708                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15709                                  					; ffOther
 15710 00001872 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15711 00001874 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15712                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15713                                  					; ff288
 15714 00001876 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15715 00001878 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15716 0000187A BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15717                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15718                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15719 0000187D B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15720                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15721                                  					; 2 sides
 15722                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15723 00001880 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15724 00001881 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15725                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15726                                  					; & head max
 15727                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15728 00001884 E9D5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15729                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15730                                  
 15731                                  Is720K:
 15732                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15733 00001887 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15734                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15735 00001888 E99EED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15736                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15737                                  
 15738                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15739                                  ;dofloppy:
 15740                                  		;retn
 15741                                  
 15742                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15743                                  
 15744                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15745                                  
 15746                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15747                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15748                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15749                                  ;
 15750                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15751                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15752                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15753                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15754                                  ;
 15755                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15756                                  ;
 15757                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15758                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15759                                  
 15760                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15761 0000188B 06                      		push	es
 15762 0000188C 57                      		push	di
 15763                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15764                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15765 0000188D C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15766                                  
 15767                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15768                                  
 15769                                  scan_bds:				
 15770 00001891 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15771 00001895 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15772                                  
 15773                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15774                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15775                                  
 15776 00001897 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15777                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15778                                  get_next_bds:				
 15779 0000189B 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15780                                  					; go to	next bds
 15781 0000189E 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15782 000018A1 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15783 000018A3 5F                      		pop	di
 15784 000018A4 07                      		pop	es
 15785 000018A5 C3                      		retn
 15786                                  
 15787                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15788                                  
 15789                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15790                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15791                                  ;
 15792                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15793                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15794                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15795                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15796                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15797                                  
 15798                                  checkromchange:	
 15799                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15800                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15801 000018A6 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15802                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15803                                  					; fchanged
 15804 000018AB C3                      		retn
 15805                                  
 15806                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15807                                  
 15808                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15809                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15810                                  ;
 15811                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15812                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15813                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15814                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15815                                  
 15816                                  resetchanged:	
 15817                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15818                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15819 000018AC 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15820                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15821                                  					; ~fchanged
 15822 000018B1 C3                      		retn
 15823                                  
 15824                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15825                                  
 15826                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15827                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15828                                  ;
 15829                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15830                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15831                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15832                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15833                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15834                                  
 15835                                  haschange:
 15836                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15837                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15838 000018B2 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15839                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15840                                  					; fchangeline
 15841 000018B7 C3                      		retn
 15842                                  
 15843                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15844                                  
 15845                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15846                                  
 15847                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15848                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15849                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15850                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15851                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15852                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15853                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15854                                  
 15855                                  ; set_volume_id
 15856                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15857                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15858                                  ;
 15859                                  ;   on entry:
 15860                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15861                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15862                                  ;
 15863                                  ;   on exit:
 15864                                  ;	carry clear:
 15865                                  ;	   successful call
 15866                                  ;	carry set
 15867                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15868                                  
 15869                                  set_volume_id:				
 15870 000018B8 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15871 000018B9 50                      		push	ax
 15872 000018BA E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15873 000018BD 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15874 000018BF E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15875 000018C2 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15876 000018C4 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15877 000018C7 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15878                                  setvret:				
 15879                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15880                                  		; cf = 0
 15881                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15882 000018CA 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15883 000018CB 5A                      		pop	dx
 15884 000018CC C3                      		retn
 15885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15886                                  
 15887                                  seterr:					
 15888 000018CD 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15889 000018CE 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15890 000018CF C3                      		retn
 15891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15892 000018D0 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15893                                  
 15894                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15895                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15896                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15897                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15898                                  
 15899                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15900                                  
 15901                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15902                                  
 15903                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15904                                  ;
 15905                                  ;   on entry:
 15906                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15907                                  ;
 15908                                  ;   on exit:
 15909                                  ;	carry clear
 15910                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15911                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15912                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15913                                  ;
 15914                                  ;	carry set:
 15915                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15916                                  
 15917                                  read_volume_id:
 15918 000018D2 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15919 000018D3 51                      		push	cx
 15920 000018D4 53                      		push	bx
 15921 000018D5 50                      		push	ax
 15922 000018D6 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15923 000018D7 57                      		push	di
 15924 000018D8 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15925 000018D9 07                      		pop	es
 15926 000018DA BF[0009]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15927 000018DD BE[F408]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15928 000018E0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15929 000018E3 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15930 000018E5 5F                      		pop	di
 15931 000018E6 07                      		pop	es
 15932 000018E7 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15933                                  					; # of fats
 15934 000018EB 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15935                                  					; sectors / fat
 15936 000018EF F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15937 000018F1 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15938                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15939                                  					;
 15940                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15941                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15942 000018F5 2EA3[D018]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15943                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15944                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15945 000018F9 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15946                                  					; # root dir entries
 15947 000018FD B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15948 000018FF D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15949                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15950                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15951 00001901 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15952                                  next_sec:				
 15953 00001902 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15954 00001903 2EA1[D018]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15955                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15956                                  					; get sector #
 15957 00001907 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15958                                  					; sectors / track
 15959 0000190B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15960 0000190D F7F1                    		div	cx
 15961                                  
 15962                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15963                                  
 15964 0000190F 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15965                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15966 00001910 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15967 00001912 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15968 00001914 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15969                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15970 00001918 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15971 0000191A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15972 0000191C E84BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15973                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15974 0000191F 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15975 00001921 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15976 00001924 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15977                                  fvid_loop:
 15978                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15979 00001926 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15980                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15981 00001928 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15982 0000192A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15983 0000192D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15984 0000192F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15985 00001932 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15986                                  ent_loop:				
 15987 00001934 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15988 00001937 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15989 00001939 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15990 0000193A 2EFF06[D018]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15991                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15992                                  					; next sector
 15993 0000193F E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15994                                  notfound:
 15995                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15996                                  		;xor	si, si
 15997 00001941 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15998                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15999                                  
 16000                                  found_vid:
 16001                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16002                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 16003 00001943 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16004 00001944 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16005 00001946 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16006 00001947 57                      		push	di
 16007 00001948 1E                      		push	ds
 16008 00001949 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16009 0000194A BF[0009]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16010 0000194D B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16011                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16012 00001950 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16013                                  		;xor	al, al
 16014                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16015 00001952 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16016 00001953 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16017                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16018                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16019                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16020 00001954 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16021 00001955 07                      		pop	es
 16022                                  fvid_ret:
 16023                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16024 00001956 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16025                                  				
 16026 00001958 58                      		pop	ax
 16027                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16028                                  		; cf = 0
 16029                                  		;clc
 16030                                  rvidret:
 16031 00001959 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16032 0000195A 59                      		pop	cx
 16033 0000195B 5A                      		pop	dx
 16034 0000195C C3                      		retn
 16035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16036                                  
 16037                                  no_vid:
 16038 0000195D 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16039                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16040                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16041 0000195E EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16043                                  
 16044                                  readviderr:				
 16045 00001960 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16046 00001961 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16047 00001962 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16048                                  
 16049                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16050                                  
 16051                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16052                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16053                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16054 00001964 BE[0009]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16055                                  		;
 16056                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16057                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16058                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16059                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16060 00001967 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16061 0000196A B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16062                                  		;
 16063 0000196D FC                      		cld
 16064 0000196E C3                      		retn
 16065                                  
 16066                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16067                                  
 16068                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16069                                  ;
 16070                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16071                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16072                                  
 16073                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16074 0000196F 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16075                                  		;push	si
 16076 00001970 51                      		push	cx
 16077                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16078 00001971 56                      		push	si
 16079                                  
 16080                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16081                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16082                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16083                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16084                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16085                                  		;cld
 16086                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16087 00001972 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16088                                  
 16089 00001975 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16090                                  		
 16091                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16092 00001977 5E                      		pop	si
 16093                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16094 00001978 59                      		pop	cx
 16095                                  		;pop	si
 16096 00001979 5F                      		pop	di
 16097 0000197A C3                      		retn
 16098                                  
 16099                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16100                                  
 16101                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16102                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16103                                  ;
 16104                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16105                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16106                                  
 16107                                  check_volume_id:
 16108 0000197B 57                      		push	di
 16109 0000197C 51                      		push	cx
 16110                                  		
 16111                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16112                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16113                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16114                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16115                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16116                                  		;cld
 16117                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16118 0000197D E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16119                                  
 16120 00001980 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16121                                  		
 16122                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16123                                  		;pop	cx
 16124                                  		;pop	di
 16125                                  		;retn
 16126 00001982 EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 16127                                  
 16128                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16129                                  
 16130                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16131                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16132                                  ;
 16133                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16134                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16135                                  ;
 16136                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16137                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16138                                  ;
 16139                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16140                                  
 16141                                  fat_check:
 16142 00001984 50                      		push	ax
 16143 00001985 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16144 00001987 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16145 0000198A 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16146                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16147 0000198E 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16148 00001990 4E                      		dec	si
 16149                                  okret1:
 16150 00001991 58                      		pop	ax
 16151 00001992 C3                      		retn
 16152                                  
 16153                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16154                                  
 16155                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 16156                                  		;times 7 db 0
 16157                                  
 16158                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16159                                  
 16160                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16161                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 16162                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 16163                                  
 16164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16165                                  
 16166                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16167                                  		;db 0
 16168                                  
 16169                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 16170                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 16171                                  
 16172                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 16173 00001993 00<rep Dh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 16174                                  %endif
 16175                                  
 16176                                  ;align 16
 16177                                  
 16178                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16179                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 16180                                  ; 29/09/2023
 16181                                  BCODEEND:
 16182                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16183                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16184                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16185                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16186                                  
 16187                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 16188

 16190                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 16191                                  ; ============================================================================
 16192                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 16198                                  ;=============================================================================
 16199                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT

 16201                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16202                                  
 16203                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 16204                                  
 16205                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16206                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 16207                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16208                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 16209                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16210                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 16211                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16212                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 16213                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16214                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 16215                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16216                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 16217                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16218                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 16219                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 16220                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16221                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 16222                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 16223                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16224                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 16225                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 16226                                  
 16227                                  ; 21/10/2022
 16228                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16229                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 16230                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 16231                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 16232                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16233                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 16234                                  
 16235                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16236                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 16237                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16238                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 16239                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 16240                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 16241                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 16242                                  ;
 16243                                  ;
 16244                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 16245                                  ;
 16246                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 16247                                  ;
 16248                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 16249                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16250                                  ;
 16251                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 16252                                  ;
 16253                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 16254                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16255                                  ;
 16256                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 16257                                  ;
 16258                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 16259                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 16260                                  ;value.
 16261                                  ;
 16262                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 16263                                  ;
 16264                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 16265                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 16266                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 16267                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 16268                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 16269                                  ;
 16270                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 16271                                  ;
 16272                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 16273                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 16274                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 16275                                  ;
 16276                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 16277                                  ;
 16278                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 16279                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16280                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 16281                                  ;
 16282                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 16283                                  ;
 16284                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 16285                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16286                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 16287                                  ;
 16288                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 16289                                  ;
 16290                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 16291                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 16292                                  ;
 16293                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 16294                                  ;
 16295                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 16296                                  ;
 16297                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 16298                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 16299                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 16300                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 16301                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 16302                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 16303                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 16304                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 16305                                  ;memory.
 16306                                  ;NOTES:
 16307                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 16308                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 16309                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 16310                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 16311                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 16312                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 16313                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 16314                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 16315                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 16316                                  
 16317                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16318                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 16319                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16320                                  
 16321                                  ;include version.inc
 16322                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16323                                  
 16324                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 16325                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 16326                                  
 16327                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 16328                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 16329                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 16330                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 16331                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 16332                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 16333                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 16334                                  
 16335                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 16336                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16337                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 16338                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 16339                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16340                                  
 16341                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 16342                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16343                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 16344                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 16345                                  
 16346                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 16347                                  
 16348                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 16349                                  				; currently 0.
 16350                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 16351                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 16352                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 16353                                  
 16354                                  ;      if1
 16355                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 16356                                  ;      endif
 16357                                  
 16358                                         ;******************************
 16359                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 16360                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 16361                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 16362                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 16363                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 16364                                         ;******************************
 16365                                  
 16366                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16367                                  ; device definitions
 16368                                  
 16369                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 16370                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 16371                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 16372                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 16373                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 16374                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 16375                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 16376                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 16377                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 16378

 16380                                  struc	SYSDEV
 16381 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 16382 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 16383 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 16384 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 16385 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 16386                                  .size:
