 31784                                  bfX:
 31785                                  	pop	cx
 31786                                  	pop	bx
 31787                                  	retn
 31788                                  
 31789                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31790                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 31791                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31792                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31793                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 31794                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31795                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31796                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31797                                  
 31798                                  isSpecified:
 31799                                  	push	ax
 31800                                  
 31801                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31802                                  	mov	bl,al
 31803                                  
 31804                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 31805                                  	;
 31806                                  	;push	ds
 31807                                  	;push	cs
 31808                                  	;pop	ds
 31809                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31810                                  	;pop	ds
 31811                                  	
 31812                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 31813                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 31814                                  
 31815                                  	pop	ax
 31816                                  	retn
 31817                                  
 31818                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31819                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31820                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31821                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31822                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31823                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31824                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31825                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31826                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31827                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31828                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31829                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31830                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31831                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31832                                  
 31833                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 31834                                  
 31835                                  shrinkMCB:
 31836                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 31837                                  	push	bx
 31838                                  	push	cx
 31839                                  	push	es
 31840                                  
 31841                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31842                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31843                                  
 31844                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31845                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31846                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31847                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31848                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31849                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 31850                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31851                                  
 31852                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31853                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31854                                  
 31855                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31856                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31857                                  
 31858                                  	add	ax,bx
 31859                                  	inc	ax
 31860                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31861                                  
 31862                                  	mov	ax,cx
 31863                                  	sub	ax,bx
 31864                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31865                                  	; ax > 0
 31866                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31867                                  
 31868                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31869                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31870                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31871                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31872                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31873                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31874                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31875                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31876                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31877                                  
 31878                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31879                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31880                                  
 31881                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31882                                  	; cf=0
 31883                                  	;clc
 31884                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31885                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31886                                  smE:	
 31887                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31888                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31889                                  	;stc
 31890                                  smX:	
 31891                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 31892                                  	pop	es
 31893                                  	pop	cx
 31894                                  	pop	bx
 31895                                  	retn
 31896                                  
 31897                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31898                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31899                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31900                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31901                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31902                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31903                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31904                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31905                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31906                                  ;
 31907                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31908                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31909                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31910                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31911                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31912                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31913                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31914                                  ;       Endif
 31915                                  ;    Endif
 31916                                  ; Endif
 31917                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31918                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31919                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31920                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31921                                  ;    ENDIF
 31922                                  ; ENDIF
 31923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31924                                  
 31925                                  _hideUMB_:
 31926                                  	push	bx
 31927                                  	push	dx
 31928                                  	push	es
 31929                                  
 31930                                  	mov	al,cl
 31931                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31932                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31933                                  
 31934                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31935                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31936                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31937                                  
 31938                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31939                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31940                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31941                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31942                                  
 31943                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31944                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31945                                  
 31946                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31947                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31948                                  
 31949                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31950                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31951                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 31952                                  hu_10:	
 31953                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31954                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31955                                  
 31956                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31957                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31958                                  
 31959                                  	mov	dx,es
 31960                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31961                                  
 31962                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31963                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31964                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31965                                  
 31966                                  	xor	dx,dx
 31967                                  hu_30:	
 31968                                  	mov	al,cl
 31969                                  
 31970                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31971                                  
 31972                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31973                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31974                                  
 31975                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31976                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31977                                  hu_X:	
 31978                                  	pop	es
 31979                                  	pop	dx
 31980                                  	pop	bx
 31981                                  	retn
 31982                                  
 31983                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31984                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31985                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31986                                  ; Entry:  None
 31987                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31988                                  ; Error:  None
 31989                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31990                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31991                                  
 31992                                  UnFreeze:
 31993                                  	push	ax
 31994                                  	push	es
 31995                                  
 31996                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31997                                  	jc	short ufX
 31998                                  
 31999                                  	mov	es,ax
 32000                                  
 32001                                  ; ------------------------------
 32002                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32003                                  ; ------------------------------
 32004                                  
 32005                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32006                                  	jnz	short uf20
 32007                                  	call	unHideMCB
 32008                                  uf20:	
 32009                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32010                                  
 32011                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32012                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32013                                  
 32014                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 32015                                  	mov     ax,es
 32016                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32017                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32018                                  	inc     ax
 32019                                  	mov     es,ax
 32020                                  
 32021                                  	jmp	short uf10
 32022                                  ufX:	
 32023                                  	pop	es
 32024                                  	pop	ax
 32025                                  	retn
 32026                                  
 32027                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32028                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 32029                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32030                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32031                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32032                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32033                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32034                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32035                                  
 32036                                  isFrozMCB:
 32037                                  	;push	ax
 32038                                  
 32039                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32040                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32041                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32042                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32043                                  
 32044                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32045                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32046                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32047                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32048                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32049                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32050                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32051                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32052                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32053                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32054                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32055                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32056                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32057                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32058                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32059                                  ifmX:	
 32060                                  	;pop	ax
 32061                                  	retn
 32062                                  
 32063                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32064                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32065                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32066                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32067                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 32068                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32069                                  ; USES:     None
 32070                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32071                                  
 32072                                  frezMCB:
 32073                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 32074                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32075                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32076                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32077                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32078                                  	retn
 32079                                  
 32080                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32081                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32082                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32083                                  ; Entry:  None
 32084                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 32085                                  ; Error:  None
 32086                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32087                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32088                                  
 32089                                  FreezeUM:
 32090                                  	push	ax
 32091                                  	push	cx
 32092                                  	push	dx
 32093                                  	push	es
 32094                                  
 32095                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 32096                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32097                                  
 32098                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32099                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 32100                                  
 32101                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32102                                  	mov	es,ax
 32103                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32104                                  
 32105                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32106                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 32107                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 32108                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 32109                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32110                                  
 32111                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32112                                  	jnz	short fum20
 32113                                  
 32114                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32115                                  fum20:	
 32116                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 32117                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 32118                                  
 32119                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 32120                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32121                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 32122                                  
 32123                                  	call	frezMCB
 32124                                  fum30:	
 32125                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32126                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32127                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32128                                  
 32129                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 32130                                  	mov     ax,es
 32131                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32132                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32133                                  	inc     ax
 32134                                  	mov     es,ax
 32135                                  	
 32136                                  	jmp	short fum10
 32137                                  
 32138                                  fumX:	pop	es
 32139                                  	pop	dx
 32140                                  	pop	cx
 32141                                  	pop	ax
 32142                                  	retn
 32143                                  
 32144                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32145                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 32146                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32147                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32148                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 32149                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32150                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 32151                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32152                                  
 32153                                  UmbTest:
 32154                                  	push	ax
 32155                                  	push	bx
 32156                                  	push	ds
 32157                                  	push	es
 32158                                  
 32159                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 32160                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 32161                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 32162                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 32163                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 32164                                  
 32165                                  	pop	es
 32166                                  	pop	ds
 32167                                  	pop	bx
 32168                                  	pop	ax
 32169                                  	retn
 32170                                  
 32171                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32172                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 32173                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32174                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32175                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 32176                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32177                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32178                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32179                                  
 32180                                  WalkMem:
 32181                                  	push	ax ; ?
 32182                                  	push	bx ; ?
 32183                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 32184                                  		   	
 32185                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 32186                                  	int	21h
 32187                                  
 32188                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 32189                                  	mov	es,ax
 32190                                  
 32191                                  ; ------------------------------
 32192                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 32193                                  ; ------------------------------
 32194                                  
 32195                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32196                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 32197                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 32198                                  
 32199                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 32200                                  
 32201                                  	mov     bx,es
 32202                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 32203                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32204                                  	inc     bx
 32205                                  	mov     es,bx
 32206                                  		
 32207                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 32208                                  um20:	
 32209                                  	mov	ax,es
 32210                                  
 32211                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 32212                                  
 32213                                  	pop	es ; ?
 32214                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 32215                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 32216                                  	retn
 32217                                  
 32218                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32219                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 32220                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32221                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 32222                                  ; EXIT:     None
 32223                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32224                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 32225                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32226                                  
 32227                                  hl_unlink:
 32228                                  	xor	bh,bh
 32229                                  
 32230                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 32231                                  	;
 32232                                  	;push	ds
 32233                                  	;push	cs
 32234                                  	;pop	ds
 32235                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 32236                                  	;pop	ds
 32237                                  
 32238                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 32239                                  
 32240                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32241                                  	int	21h
 32242                                  	retn
 32243                                  
 32244                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32245                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32246                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32247                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32248                                  
 32249                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 32250                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 32251                                  
 32252                                  ;   Modification log:
 32253                                  ;
 32254                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 32255                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 32256                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 32257                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 32258                                  
 32259                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 32260                                  
 32261                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32262                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 32263                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32264                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 32265                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 32266                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 32267                                  ; ERROR:  None
 32268                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 32269                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32270                                  
 32271                                  UnHideUMBs:
 32272                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 32273                                  
 32274                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32275                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 32276                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 32277                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 32278                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 32279                                  ;    every command execution.
 32280                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32281                                  
 32282                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 32283                                  	;
 32284                                  	;push	ds
 32285                                  	;push	cs
 32286                                  	;pop	ds
 32287                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 32288                                  	;pop	ds	
 32289                                  
 32290                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 32291                                  
 32292                                  	or	al,al
 32293                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 32294                                  
 32295                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 32296                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 32297                                  	retn			; that.
 32298                                  uhu10:	
 32299                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 32300                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 32301                                  
 32302                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 32303                                  	;
 32304                                  	;push	es
 32305                                  	;push	cs
 32306                                  	;pop	es
 32307                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 32308                                  	;pop	ds	
 32309                                  
 32310                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 32311                                  
 32312                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 32313                                  
 32314                                  	pop	ax
 32315                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32316                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 32317                                  	retn
 32318                                  
 32319                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32320                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 32321                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32322                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 32323                                  ; EXIT:     None
 32324                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32325                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 32326                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32327                                  
 32328                                  he_unlink:
 32329                                  	xor	bh, bh
 32330                                  
 32331                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 32332                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 32333                                  
 32334                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32335                                  	int	21h
 32336                                  	retn
 32337                                  
 32338                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32339                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 32340                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32341                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32342                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 32343                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 32344                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32345                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32346                                  
 32347                                  FreeUMBs:
 32348                                  	push	ax
 32349                                  	push	es
 32350                                  
 32351                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32352                                  	jc	short fusX
 32353                                  
 32354                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 32355                                  fus10:	
 32356                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32357                                  	jnz	short fus20
 32358                                  	call	freeMCB
 32359                                  fus20:	   
 32360                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32361                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32362                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 32363                                  
 32364                                  	mov	ax,es
 32365                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32366                                  	inc	ax
 32367                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32368                                  
 32369                                  	jmp	short fus10
 32370                                  fusX:	
 32371                                  	pop	es
 32372                                  	pop	ax
 32373                                  	retn
 32374                                  
 32375                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32376                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 32377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32378                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32379                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 32380                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32381                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32382                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32383                                  
 32384                                  isHideMCB:
 32385                                  	;push	ax
 32386                                  
 32387                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 32388                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 32389                                  
 32390                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 32391                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 32392                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 32393                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32394                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32395                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 32396                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 32397                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32398                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32399                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32400                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32401                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32402                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32403                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32404                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32405                                  ihm_x:	
 32406                                  	;pop	ax
 32407                                  	retn
 32408                                  
 32409                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32410                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 32411                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32412                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32413                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 32414                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32415                                  ; USES:     AX
 32416                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32417                                  
 32418                                  freeMCB:
 32419                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32420                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 32421                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 32422                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 32423                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 32424                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 32425                                  	retn
 32426                                  
 32427                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32428                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 32429                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32430                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 32431                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 32432                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 32433                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32434                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32435                                  
 32436                                  HeadUmb:
 32437                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32438                                  
 32439                                  	;push	si ; ?
 32440                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 32441                                  	;push	es
 32442                                  	;push	bx ; *
 32443                                  
 32444                                  	; 09/04/2019
 32445                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 32446                                  
 32447                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 32448                                  	int	21h
 32449                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 32450                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 32451                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 32452                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 32453                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 32454                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 32455                                  
 32456                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 32457                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 32458                                  xhu_e:	
 32459                                  	;stc
 32460                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 32461                                  xhu_x:	
 32462                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 32463                                  	;pop	es	
 32464                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 32465                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 32466                                  	retn
 32467                                  
 32468                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32469                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 32470                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32471                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32472                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 32473                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32474                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 32475                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32476                                  
 32477                                  linkumb:
 32478                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 32479                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 32480                                  
 32481                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 32482                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 32483                                  
 32484                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32485                                  	mov	bx,1
 32486                                  	int	21h
 32487                                  lumbX:
 32488                                  	retn
 32489                                  
 32490                                  %endif
 32491                                  
 32492                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32493                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 32494                                  
 32495                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32496                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32497                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32498                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32499                                  
 32500                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32501                                  ;
 32502                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 32503                                  ;
 32504                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 32505                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 32506                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 32507                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 32508                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 32509                                  ;
 32510                                  ;	Output : none
 32511                                  ;
 32512                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 32513                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 32514                                  ;
 32515                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32516                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 32517                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 32518                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 32519                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 32520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32521                                  
 32522                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32523                                  InitDevLoad:
 32524                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32525                                  	; ds = cs
 32526 00002761 803E[731E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32527                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 32528                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 32529 00002766 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 32530                                  
 32531                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32532                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32533                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 32534                                  ;
 32535                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 32536                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 32537                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 32538                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 32539                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 32540                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 32541                                  ;
 32542                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 32543                                  ;
 32544                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 32545                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 32546                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 32547                                  ;	pushf
 32548                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 32549                                  ;	popf
 32550                                  ;
 32551                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 32552                                  ;
 32553                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 32554                                  
 32555                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32556                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 32557                                  InitForConv:
 32558                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32559                                  	; ds = cs
 32560 00002768 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 32561                                  					;  current UMB ?
 32562 0000276B 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 32563 0000276D E83C04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 32564 00002770 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 32565 00002773 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 32566                                  					;  in low memory
 32567                                  InitForHi:
 32568                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32569                                  	; ds = cs
 32570                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 32571                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 32572                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 32573 00002775 A1[691E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 32574 00002778 8B16[651E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32575 0000277C 0316[671E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 32576 00002780 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 32577                                  
 32578                                  InitForLo:
 32579                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32580                                  	; ds = cs
 32581                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 32582 00002782 C606[731E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32583                                  initforlo_x:
 32584                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32585                                  	; ds = cs
 32586                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 32587                                  					;  we are loading low
 32588                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 32589                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 32590 00002787 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 32591 0000278A 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 32592                                  idl1:
 32593 0000278E E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 32594                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32595                                  	; ds = cs
 32596                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 32597                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 32598                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 32599                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 32600 00002791 A3[581E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 32601 00002794 8916[5A1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 32602 00002798 C706[5C1E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 32603 0000279E A3[5E1E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 32604 000027A1 C3                      	retn
 32605                                  
 32606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32607                                  ;
 32608                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 32609                                  ;
 32610                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 32611                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 32612                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 32613                                  ;		   current UMB
 32614                                  ;
 32615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32616                                  
 32617                                  SpaceInUMB:
 32618                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32619                                  	; ds = cs
 32620                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 32621                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 32622                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 32623 000027A2 A1[671E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 32624 000027A5 0306[651E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 32625 000027A9 2B06[691E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 32626                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32627                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 32628                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 32629                                  	;stc
 32630                                  	;retn
 32631                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32632 000027AD 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 32633 000027B0 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 32634                                  spcinumb1:
 32635 000027B2 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 32636                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32637                                  	; ds = cs
 32638 000027B3 3B06[561E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 32639                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 32640                                  spcinumb2:
 32641 000027B7 C3                      	retn
 32642                                  
 32643                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32644                                  ;
 32645                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 32646                                  ;
 32647                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 32648                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32649                                  ;
 32650                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32651                                  
 32652                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32653                                  ;
 32654                                  ;PrepareMark:
 32655                                  ;	push	ds
 32656                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 32657                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32658                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32659                                  ;	pop	ds
 32660                                  ;
 32661                                  ;	inc	ax
 32662                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32663                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32664                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32665                                  ;	retn
 32666                                  
 32667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32668                                  ;
 32669                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32670                                  ;
 32671                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32672                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32673                                  ;		 the device.
 32674                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32675                                  ;
 32676                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32677                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32678                                  ;	UMB.
 32679                                  ;
 32680                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32681                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32682                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32683                                  ;
 32684                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32685                                  
 32686                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32687                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 32688                                  
 32689                                  GetUMBForDev:
 32690                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32691                                  	; ds = cs
 32692 000027B8 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 32693 000027BB B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32694 000027BE CD21                    	int	21h
 32695                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32696                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32697                                  
 32698 000027C0 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32699                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 32700                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32701 000027C2 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 32702                                  
 32703 000027C4 4B                      	dec	bx
 32704                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32705                                  	; ds = cs
 32706 000027C5 391E[561E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 32707                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32708 000027C9 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32709                                  
 32710 000027CB 43                      	inc	bx
 32711                                  
 32712 000027CC B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32713 000027CF CD21                    	int	21h
 32714 000027D1 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32715                                  
 32716                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32717                                  	;dec	ax
 32718                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32719                                  	;
 32720                                  PrepareMark:
 32721 000027D3 1E                      	push	ds
 32722 000027D4 48                      	dec	ax
 32723 000027D5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32724 000027D7 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32725 000027DD C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32726 000027E3 40                      	inc	ax
 32727 000027E4 1F                      	pop	ds
 32728                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32729                                  	; ds = cs
 32730                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32731                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32732                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32733                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 32734 000027E5 891E[671E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 32735 000027E9 A3[651E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32736 000027EC A3[691E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32737                                  	;
 32738                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32739                                  	; cf=0
 32740                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 32741 000027EF C3                      	retn
 32742                                  
 32743                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32744                                  %if 1
 32745                                  gufd_err:
 32746 000027F0 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 32747                                  gufd_error:
 32748 000027F2 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32749 000027F4 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 32750 000027F5 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 32751                                  %endif
 32752                                  
 32753                                  ; 09/09/2023
 32754                                  %if 0
 32755                                  gufd_err:
 32756                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32757                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32758                                  	; ds = cs
 32759                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 32760                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32761                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32762                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 32763                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32764                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32765                                  	stc
 32766                                  	retn
 32767                                  %endif

 32769                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32770                                  ;
 32771                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32772                                  ;
 32773                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32774                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32775                                  ;
 32776                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32777                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32778                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32779                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32780                                  ;
 32781                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32782                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32783                                  ;
 32784                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32785                                  
 32786                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32787                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32788                                  
 32789                                  DevSetMark:
 32790 000027F7 06                      	push	es
 32791 000027F8 57                      	push	di
 32792 000027F9 1E                      	push	ds
 32793 000027FA 56                      	push	si
 32794 000027FB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32795 000027FD 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32796 00002803 40                      	inc	ax
 32797 00002804 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32798                                  
 32799                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32800                                  
 32801 00002808 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32802                                  	
 32803                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32804                                  	; ds = cs
 32805                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32806 00002809 C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32807                                  
 32808 0000280D 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32809 0000280F FC                      	cld
 32810                                  dsm_again:
 32811 00002810 AC                      	lodsb
 32812 00002811 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32813 00002813 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32814 00002815 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32815 00002817 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32816                                  isit_slash:
 32817 00002819 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 32818 0000281B 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32819 0000281D 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32820 0000281F EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32821                                  isit_null:
 32822 00002821 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32823 00002823 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32824 00002825 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32825                                  
 32826 00002827 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32827 0000282A B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32828                                  dsm_next_char:
 32829 0000282D AC                      	lodsb
 32830 0000282E 08C0                    	or	al, al
 32831 00002830 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 32832 00002832 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 32833 00002834 7403                    	je	short blankout
 32834 00002836 AA                      	stosb
 32835 00002837 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 32836                                  blankout:
 32837 00002839 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 32838 0000283B B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 32839 0000283D F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 32840                                  dsm_exit:
 32841 0000283F 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 32842 00002840 5E                      	pop	si
 32843 00002841 1F                      	pop	ds
 32844 00002842 5F                      	pop	di
 32845 00002843 07                      	pop	es
 32846 00002844 C3                      	retn
 32847

 32849                                  ;
 32850                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32851                                  ;
 32852                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32853                                  ;
 32854                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32855                                  ;
 32856                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32857                                  ;	in DevSize
 32858                                  ;
 32859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32860                                  
 32861                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32862                                  SizeDevice:
 32863                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32864                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32865 00002845 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 32866 00002846 06                      	push	es
 32867 00002847 1F                      	pop	ds
 32868 00002848 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 32869 0000284A B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 32870 0000284D CD21                    	int	21h
 32871 0000284F 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32872                                  
 32873 00002851 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32874 00002853 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32875 00002856 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32876 00002858 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32877 0000285A CD21                    	int	21h
 32878 0000285C 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32879 0000285E 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32880 00002861 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32881 00002864 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32882 00002868 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32883 0000286A 2EC706[561E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32884                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32885 00002871 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32886                                  szdev1:
 32887 00002873 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32888 00002875 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32889 00002877 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32890 00002879 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32891 0000287B 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32892                                  	;
 32893                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32894 0000287D 2E3B06[741E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32895                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 32896                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32897 00002882 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 32898                                  
 32899 00002884 2EA1[741E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32900                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32901 00002888 F8                      	clc
 32902                                  szdev2:
 32903 00002889 2EA3[561E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32904                                  
 32905                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32906                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32907                                  	; cf=0
 32908                                  	;clc
 32909                                  sd_close:
 32910 0000288D 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32911                                  					;  carry flag
 32912 0000288E B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32913 00002891 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32914 00002893 9D                      	popf
 32915                                  sd_err:
 32916                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32917                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32918 00002894 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32919 00002895 C3                      	retn
 32920                                  
 32921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32922                                  ;
 32923                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32924                                  ;
 32925                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32926                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32927                                  ;
 32928                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32929                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32930                                  ;

 32937 00002896 2E8B1E[581E]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]

 32939                                  					;  block for exec with
 32940                                  					;  Load address

 32949 000028AF CD21                    	int	21h			;load in the device driver
 32950                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 32951                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 32952                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 32953                                  		; AL = subfunction 
 32954 000028B1 C3                      	retn

 33141                                  ; procedure : ParseSize
 33142                                  ;
 33143                                  ;	Parses the command line for SIZE= command
 33144                                  ;
 33145                                  ;	ES:SI = command line to parsed
 33146                                  ;
 33147                                  ;	returns ptr to command line after SIZE= option in ES:SI
 33148                                  ;	updates the DevSizeOption variable with value supplied
 33149                                  ;	in SIZE=option
 33150                                  ;	Returns carry if the SIZE option was invalid
 33151                                  ;
 33152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33153                                  
 33154                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33155                                  	; (SYSINIT:2D5Ah)
 33156                                  
 33157                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization & BugFix)
 33158                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3871h) - Retro DOS v4.2 -
 33159                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3D6Eh)  - Retro DOS v5.0 -

 33162                                  	;mov	bx,si

 33166                                  
 33167                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33168                                  	; ds = cs
 33169                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevSizeOption],0 ; init the value
 33170                                  	;mov	[cs:DevCmdLine],si
 33171                                  	;mov	[cs:DevCmdLine+2],es
 33172 00002935 C706[741E]0000          	mov	word [DevSizeOption],0 ; init the value
 33173 0000293B 8936[841E]              	mov	[DevCmdLine],si
 33174 0000293F 8C06[861E]              	mov	[DevCmdLine+2],es
