 33280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33281                                  ;
 33282                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33283                                  ;
 33284                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33285                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33286                                  ;
 33287                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33288                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33289                                  ;
 33290                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33291                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33292                                  ;
 33293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33294                                  
 33295                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33296                                  
 33297                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33298                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33299                                  GetHexNum:
 33300 00002978 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33301 0000297A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33302                                  ghn_next:
 33303 0000297C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33304 0000297F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33305 00002982 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33306 00002984 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33307 00002987 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33308 00002989 50                      	push	ax
 33309 0000298A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33310 0000298C E82006                  	call	delim
 33311 0000298F 58                      	pop	ax
 33312                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33313 00002990 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33314 00002993 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33315 00002995 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33316                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33317                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33318 00002998 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33319                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33320                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33321                                  ghn_shift1:
 33322 0000299A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33323 0000299C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33324 0000299E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33325 000029A0 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33326 000029A2 46                      	inc	si
 33327 000029A3 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33328                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33329 000029A5 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33330 000029A8 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33331 000029AB F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33332 000029AF 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33333                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33334                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33335                                  ghn_shift2:
 33336 000029B1 F8                      	clc
 33337 000029B2 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33338 000029B4 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33339 000029B6 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33340 000029B8 F8                      	clc
 33341 000029B9 C3                      	retn
 33342                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33343                                  ghn_err:
 33344                                  gnib_err:
 33345 000029BA F9                      	stc
 33346                                  ghn_ret:
 33347                                  gnib_ret:
 33348 000029BB C3                      	retn

 33351                                  ;
 33352                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 33353                                  ;
 33354                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33355                                  ;
 33356                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 33357                                  ;
 33358                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33359                                  ;
 33360                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33361                                  
 33362                                  GetNibble:
 33363 000029BC 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 33364                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33365                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33366 000029BF 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33367 000029C1 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 33368 000029C4 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 33369 000029C6 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 33370 000029C9 C3                      	retn
 33371                                  is_it_hex:
 33372 000029CA 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 33373                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33374                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33375 000029CD 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33376 000029CF 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 33377 000029D2 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 33378 000029D4 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 33379 000029D7 C3                      	retn
 33380                                  
 33381                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33382                                  ;gnib_err:
 33383                                  ;	stc
 33384                                  ;gnib_ret:
 33385                                  ;	retn

 33400                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33401                                  ;
 33402                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33403                                  ;
 33404                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33405                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33406                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33407                                  ;			; DS = data
 33408                                  ;
 33409                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33410                                  ;
 33411                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33412                                  ;
 33413                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33414                                  
 33415                                  umb_insert:
 33416 000029D8 1E                      	push	ds
 33417                                  
 33418                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33419                                  	; ds = cs
 33420                                  
 33421                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33422 000029D9 8E1E[821E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33423                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33424 000029DD 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33425 000029E1 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33426 000029E3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33427                                  ui_next:
 33428 000029E5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33429                                  					;    new block
 33430 000029E7 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33431                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33432                                  					;    last
 33433 000029E9 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33434 000029EF 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33435                                  					; N: get next block
 33436 000029F1 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33437                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33438 000029F3 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33439 000029F6 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33440                                  
 33441                                  ui_insert:
 33442 000029F8 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33443 000029FA 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33444                                  
 33445 000029FB 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33446 000029FD F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33447                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33448 000029FF C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33449                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33450 00002A04 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33451                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33452 00002A0A 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33453                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33454 00002A0E C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33455                                  
 33456                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33457                                  
 33458 00002A14 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33459 00002A16 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33460 00002A1C 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33461                                  					; mark as free
 33462 00002A23 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33463                                  					; start & end of new block
 33464 00002A26 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33465                                  
 33466                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33467                                  	
 33468 00002A2B 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33469 00002A2D 43                      	inc	bx
 33470 00002A2E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33471 00002A30 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33472                                  
 33473                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33474                                  					; this block
 33475 00002A31 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33476                                  	
 33477 00002A33 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33478 00002A39 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33479 00002A40 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33480 00002A44 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33481                                  
 33482 00002A4B EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33483                                  
 33484                                  ui_append:
 33485                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33486 00002A4D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33487 00002A52 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33488                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33489                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33490                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33491 00002A58 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33492                                  
 33493 00002A5E 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33494 00002A60 40                      	inc	ax
 33495 00002A61 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33496                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33497 00002A63 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33498                                  
 33499 00002A65 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33500                                  
 33501 00002A67 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33502 00002A6D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33503 00002A74 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33504 00002A78 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33505                                  
 33506                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33507 00002A7F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33508 00002A81 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33509 00002A87 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33510                                  					; mark as free
 33511 00002A8E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33512 00002A8F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33513                                  ui_done:
 33514                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33515 00002A94 1F                      	pop	ds
 33516                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33517                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33518                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 33519 00002A95 C3                      	retn

 33524                                  ;

 33529                                  AllocUMB:

 33533 00002A99 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 33534                                  au_next:
 33535 00002A9B E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 33536 00002A9E 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 33537 00002AA0 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 33538 00002AA3 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 33539                                  au_coalesce:
 33540                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33541                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 33542                                  ;au_exit:
 33543                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 33544                                  ;	; ds = cs
 33545                                  ;	retn
 33546                                  
 33547                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33548                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 33549                                  
 33550                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33551                                  
 33552                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33553                                  ;
 33554                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33555                                  ;
 33556                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33557                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33558                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33559                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33560                                  ;
 33561                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33562                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33563                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 33564                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33565                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33566                                  ;
 33567                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33568                                  
 33569                                  umb_coalesce:
 33570                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33571                                  	; ds = cs
 33572 00002AA5 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33573                                  
 33574 00002AA6 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33575                                  
 33576                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33577                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33578 00002AA8 8E06[821E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33579 00002AAC 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33580                                  uc_nextfree:
 33581 00002AB1 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33582 00002AB3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33583                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33584 00002AB5 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33585 00002ABA 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33586                                  					; N: get next arena
 33587 00002ABC E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33588 00002ABF 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33589 00002AC1 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33590                                  uc_again:
 33591 00002AC3 E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 33592 00002AC6 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33593                                  uc_check:
 33594 00002AC8 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33595 00002ACD 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33596                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33597 00002ACF 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33598 00002AD4 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33599                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33600 00002AD5 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33601 00002AD9 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33602 00002ADC 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33603 00002ADE EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33604                                  
 33605                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33606                                  ;uc_done:
 33607                                  	;retn

 33629                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es

 33639                                  	;jc	short iau_err

 33656                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33657                                  ;
 33658                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 33659                                  ;
 33660                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 33661                                  ;
 33662                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33663                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33664                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33665                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33666                                  ;				NC
 33667                                  ;			  else 
 33668                                  ;				CY
 33669                                  ;
 33670                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33671                                  ;
 33672                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33673                                  
 33674                                  umb_allocate:
 33675                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33676                                  	; ds = cs
 33677 00002B0E 50                      	push	ax
 33678 00002B0F B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33679 00002B11 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 33680                                  					;   possible
 33681                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33683                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33684                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33685                                  					; the largest UMB
 33686 00002B18 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 33687 00002B1A 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 33688                                  	
 33689 00002B1C B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33690                                  
 33691                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33692 00002B1E FF1E[6B1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33693                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33694                                  
 33695 00002B22 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 33696                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 33697                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33698 00002B25 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33699                                  ua_err:
 33700 00002B27 F9                      	stc	
 33701                                  
 33702                                  	;clc
 33703                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33704                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33705                                  	; cf=0
 33706                                  	;clc 
 33707                                  ua_done:
 33708 00002B28 58                      	pop	ax
 33709 00002B29 C3                      	retn
 33710                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33711                                  ;ua_err:
 33712                                  	;stc
 33713                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 33730 00002B2F 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 33731                                  _get_next_:

 33733 00002B33 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length

 33735 00002B38 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33736                                  	;clc

 33738                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33739                                  	; cf=0
 33740                                  	;clc
 33741 00002B3A C3                      	retn

 33743 00002B3B F9                      	stc
 33744                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 33745                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 33746 00002B3C C3                      	retn

 33749                                  ;
 33750                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33751                                  ;
 33752                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33753                                  
 33754                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33755                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 33756                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 33757                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33758                                  	; ds = cs
 33759 00002B3D E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 33760 00002B40 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33761                                  
 33762                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 33763                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 33764                                  
 33765                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33766                                  	; ds = cs
 33767                                  
 33768 00002B42 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 33769 00002B44 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33770 00002B46 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33771                                  
 33772 00002B48 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 33773 00002B4A 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33774                                  
 33775 00002B4C F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33776                                  
 33777                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33778                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33779 00002B4E 49                      	dec	cx
 33780 00002B4F 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33781                                  	
 33782 00002B51 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33783 00002B57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33784                                  					
 33785 00002B5E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33786 00002B62 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33787                                  
 33788                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 33789                                  
 33790 00002B69 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 33791 00002B6B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33792 00002B71 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33793                                  					; mark as free 
 33794 00002B78 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33795 00002B79 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33796                                  
 33797                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33798                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33799 00002B7E 8E06[821E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 33800                                  	; 18/09/2023
 33801 00002B82 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 33802                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 33803                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 33804                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33805                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 33806                                  
 33807                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 33808                                  
 33809                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 33810                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 33811                                  	; 18/09/2023
 33812 00002B87 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33813 00002B8C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 33814                                  ;scan_next
 33815                                  ; 09/12/2022
 33816                                  scannext:
 33817 00002B8E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 33818 00002B92 740C                    	je	short got_last
 33819

 33821 00002B96 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33822 00002B9B 40                      	inc	ax
 33823 00002B9C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33824                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 33825                                  	; 09/12/2022
 33826 00002B9E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 33827                                  got_last:
 33828                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 33829                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33830 00002BA0 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33831                                  
 33832 00002BA5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33833                                  	;clc
 33834                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33835                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33836                                  	; cf=0
 33837                                  	;clc
 33838 00002BAB C3                      	retn
 33839                                  
 33840                                  ; 11/12/2022
 33841                                  ;;lfu_err:
 33842                                  ;	;stc
 33843                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33844                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 33845                                  ;	; cf=1
 33846                                  ;	;stc
 33847                                  ;	retn

 33850                                  ;
 33851                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33852                                  ;
 33853                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33854                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33855                                  ;
 33856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33857                                  
 33858                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33859                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33860                                  	; ds = cs
 33861 00002BAC 833E[651E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33862                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33863 00002BB1 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 33864 00002BB3 06                      	push	es
 33865 00002BB4 53                      	push	bx
 33866                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33867                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33868                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33869                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33870 00002BB5 8B1E[691E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33871 00002BB9 2B1E[651E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33872 00002BBD 8E06[651E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33873                                  	
 33874 00002BC1 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33875 00002BC4 CD21                    	int	21h
 33876                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33877                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33878                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33879 00002BC6 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33880 00002BC8 48                      	dec	ax
 33881 00002BC9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33882 00002BCB 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33883 00002BD2 5B                      	pop	bx
 33884 00002BD3 07                      	pop	es
 33885                                  su_exit:
 33886 00002BD4 C3                      	retn

 33893                                  ;
 33894                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33895                                  
 33896                                  UnlinkUMB:
 33897                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33898                                  	; ds = cs
 33899 00002BD5 1E                      	push	ds
 33900 00002BD6 06                      	push	es
 33901                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33902 00002BD7 803E[811E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 33903                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33904 00002BDC 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33905                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33906 00002BDE 8E06[821E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33907                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33908 00002BE2 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33909 00002BE7 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33910                                  ulu_next:
 33911 00002BEC E83BFF                  	call	get_next
 33912 00002BEF 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33913 00002BF1 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33914 00002BF3 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33915 00002BF5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33916 00002BF7 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33917                                  ulu_found:
 33918                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33919 00002BF9 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33920                                  ulu_x:
 33921 00002BFE 07                      	pop	es
 33922 00002BFF 1F                      	pop	ds
 33923 00002C00 C3                      	retn

 33925                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33926                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33927                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33928                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33929                                  
 33930                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33931                                  ;
 33932                                  ; Summary:
 33933                                  ;
 33934                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33935                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33936                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33937                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33938                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33939                                  ;
 33940                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33941                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33942                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33943                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33944                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33945                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33946                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33947                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33948                                  ;
 33949                                  ; Example:
 33950                                  ;
 33951                                  ;   [menu]
 33952                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33953                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33954                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33955                                  ;
 33956                                  ;   [network]
 33957                                  ;   include misc
 33958                                  ;   device=foo
 33959                                  ;
 33960                                  ;   [misc]
 33961                                  ;   device=bar
 33962                                  ;   include alternate
 33963                                  ;
 33964                                  ;   [alternate]
 33965                                  ;   device=tar
 33966                                  ;
 33967                                  ;
 33968                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33969                                  ;
 33970                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33971                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33972                                  ;
 33973                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33974                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33975                                  ;   following order:
 33976                                  ;
 33977                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33978                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33979                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33980                                  ;
 33981                                  
 33982                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33983                                  
 33984                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33985                                  
 33986                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33987                                  
 33988                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33989                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33990                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33991                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33992                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33993                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33994                                  
 33995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33996                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33997                                  
 33998                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33999                                  
 34000                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34001                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34002                                  
 34003 00002C01 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 34007                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34008                                  ;
 34009                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34010                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34011                                  ;
 34012                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34013                                  
 34014                                  setparms:
 34015 00002C02 1E                      	push	ds
 34016 00002C03 50                      	push	ax
 34017 00002C04 53                      	push	bx
 34018 00002C05 51                      	push	cx
 34019 00002C06 52                      	push	dx
 34020                                  
 34021 00002C07 0E                      	push	cs
 34022 00002C08 1F                      	pop	ds
 34023                                  
 34024 00002C09 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34025 00002C0B 8A1E[8B35]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 34026                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34027 00002C0F 43                      	inc	bx
 34028                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 34029                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 34030 00002C10 BA[6334]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 34031                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 34032                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 34033                                  	; 14/08/2023
 34034 00002C13 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 34035                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 34036                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 34037                                  	; 14/08/2023
 34038 00002C16 B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 34039 00002C19 CD21                    	int	21h
 34040                                  
 34041                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34042                                  ;
 34043                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 34044                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 34045                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 34046                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34047                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 34048                                  ;
 34049                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34050                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 34051                                  
 34052                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34053                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34054                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34055 00002C1B F606[8C35]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34056 00002C20 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 34057                                  
 34058                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 34059                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34060 00002C22 8A0E[8B35]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 34061 00002C26 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34062 00002C29 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 34063                                  
 34064 00002C2B B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 34065 00002C2D D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 34066                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 34067 00002C2F 0806[2805]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 34068                                  
 34069                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34070                                  ;
 34071                                  ;not_ec35:
 34072                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 34073                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 34074                                  ;

 34076                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34077                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 34078                                  ;	cmp	al,[EOT]
 34079                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok
 34080                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 34081                                  
 34082                                  eot_ok:
 34083 00002C33 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 34084 00002C34 59                      	pop	cx
 34085 00002C35 5B                      	pop	bx
 34086 00002C36 58                      	pop	ax
 34087 00002C37 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 34088 00002C38 C3                      	retn

 34093                                  ;
 34094                                  ; replace default values for further drivparm commands
 34095                                  ;

 34097                                  
 34098                                  diddleback:
 34099 00002C39 1E                      	push	ds
 34100 00002C3A 0E                      	push	cs
 34101 00002C3B 1F                      	pop	ds
 34102                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+4],80
 34103 00002C3C C706[6734]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34104                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 34105 00002C42 C606[6434]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 34106                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 34107 00002C47 C706[6534]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0
 34108 00002C4D C706[8C35]0000          	mov	word [switches],0	    ; zero all switches
 34109 00002C53 1F                      	pop	ds
 34110 00002C54 C3                      	retn
 34111                                  
 34112                                  ; 04/01/2023
 34113                                  %if 0
 34114                                  
 34115                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34116                                  
 34117                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34118                                  ;
 34119                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34120                                  ;
 34121                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34122                                  ;
 34123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34124                                  
 34125                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34126                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 34127                                  
 34128                                  parseline:
 34129                                  	push	ds
 34130                                  
 34131                                  	push	cs
 34132                                  	pop	ds
 34133                                  
 34134                                  nextswtch:
 34135                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34136                                  	je	short done_line
 34137                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34138                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34139                                  
 34140                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34141                                  
 34142                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34143                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34144                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34145                                  	je	short getparm
 34146                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34147                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 34148                                  
 34149                                  getparm:
 34150                                  	call	check_switch
 34151                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34152                                  	jc	short swterr
 34153                                  getnext:
 34154                                  	call	getchr
 34155                                  	jc	short done_line
 34156                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 34157                                  swterr:
 34158                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34159                                  
 34160                                  done_line:
 34161                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34162                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 34163                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 34164                                  	jnz	short okay
 34165                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 34166                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 34167                                  
 34168                                  okay:
 34169                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 34170                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 34171                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 34172                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 34173                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 34174                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34175                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34176                                  	; cf=0
 34177                                  	;clc
 34178                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 34179                                  exitpl:
 34180                                  	pop	ds
 34181                                  	retn
 34182                                  put_back:
 34183                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 34184                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 34185                                  	jmp	short done_line
 34186                                  
 34187                                  %endif
 34188                                  
 34189                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34190                                  ;
 34191                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34192                                  ;
 34193                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34194                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34195                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34196                                  ; error.

 34200                                  ; 09/09/2023

 34289                                  ; procedure : process_num
 34290                                  ;
 34291                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),

 34294                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.

 34324                                  	;jmp	short done_ret

 34461                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34462                                  ;
 34463                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34464                                  ;
 34465                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34466                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34467                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34468                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34469                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34470                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34471                                  ;
 34472                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34473                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34474                                  ;
 34475                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34476                                  ;
 34477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34478                                  
 34479                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34480                                  
 34481                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34482                                  setdeviceparameters:
 34483                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34484                                  	; ds = cs
 34485

 34542 00002D59 A2[6C34]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 34543                                  
 34544 00002D5C B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 34545

 34547

 34554 00002D62 3906[7934]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 34555                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?

 34557                                  
 34558 00002D68 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 34559                                  
 34560                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34561                                  
 34562 00002D6A 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34563                                  
 34564                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34565                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34566                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34567                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34568                                  
 34569                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34570                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34571                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34572                                  
 34573 00002D6C 833E[7734]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18

 34575 00002D73 833E[6734]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34576 00002D78 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34577

 34579                                  
 34580 00002D7A EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34581

 34583

 34587 00002D83 833E[7734]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34588 00002D88 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34589

 34591 00002D8C EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 34592

 34594                                  
 34595                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34596                                  
 34597 00002D8E 803E[6434]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34598 00002D93 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34599                                  
 34600                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34601                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34602                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 34603

 34605 00002D97 833E[7734]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34606                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34607 00002D9C 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 34608

 34610                                  
 34611                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 34612                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 34613                                  
 34614                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 34615                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34616                                  	; ax = 2
 34617 00002DA0 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 34618 00002DA1 A2[6C34]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 34619                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 34620                                  
 34621                                  got_correct_mediad:
 34622 00002DA4 881E[7434]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 34623                                  
 34624                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 34625                                  
 34626 00002DA8 A1[6734]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 34627 00002DAB F726[7934]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 34628 00002DAF F726[7734]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34629 00002DB3 A3[7234]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 34630 00002DB6 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 34631

 35119                                  ;
 35120                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 35121                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 35122                                  ;;endif
 35123                                  
 35124                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35125 00002F78 C3                      	retn
 35126                                  
 35127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35128                                  ;
 35129                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35130                                  ;
 35131                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35132                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35133                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35134                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35135                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35136                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35137                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35138                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35139                                  ;
 35140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35141                                  
 35142                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35143                                  
 35144                                  skip_comment:
 35145 00002F79 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35146                                  
 35147                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35148                                  	; ds = cs	
 35149                                  
 35150 00002F7B 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35151                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35152 00002F80 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35153                                  
 35154 00002F82 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35155                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35156 00002F87 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35157                                  
 35158 00002F89 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35159                                  	
 35160 00002F8C 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35161                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35162 00002F90 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35163                                  
 35164 00002F92 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35165                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35166 00002F97 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35167                                  
 35168 00002F99 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35169                                  	
 35170 00002F9D 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35171                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35172 00002FA1 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35173                                  skip_cmmt:
 35174 00002FA3 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35175 00002FA5 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35176 00002FA8 46                      	inc	si
 35177 00002FA9 49                      	dec	cx
 35178 00002FAA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35179 00002FAC 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35180                                  no_commt:
 35181 00002FAE C3                      	retn
 35182                                  
 35183                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35184                                  %if 0
 35185                                  
 35186                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35187                                  
 35188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35189                                  ;
 35190                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35191                                  ;
 35192                                  ;   INPUT
 35193                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35194                                  ;
 35195                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35196                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35197                                  ;
 35198                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35199                                  ;       All
 35200                                  ;
 35201                                  ;   HISTORY
 35202                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35203                                  ;
 35204                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35205                                  
 35206                                  kbd_read:
 35207                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35208                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35209                                  
 35210                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35211                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35212                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35213                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35214                                  kbd_loop:
 35215                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 35216                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35217                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35218                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35219                                          int     16h             ;
 35220                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35221                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35222                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35223                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35224                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35225                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35226                                  
 35227                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 35228                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35229                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35230                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35231                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35232                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35233                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35234                                          int     16h             ;
 35235                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35236                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35237                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 35238                                          inc     bx
 35239                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35240                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35241                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35242                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35243                                          int     16h             ;
 35244                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35245                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35246                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35247                                  
 35248                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35249                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35250                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35251                                  	
 35252                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35253                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35254                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35255                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35256                                          call    print
 35257                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35258                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 35259                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35260                                  kbd_notf5:
 35261                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35262                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35263                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35264                                  
 35265                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35266                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35267                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35268                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35269                                          call    print           ;
 35270                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35271                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35272                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35273                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 35274                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35275                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35276                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 35277                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35278                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35279                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35280                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35281                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35282                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35283                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35284                                          retn			;
 35285                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35286                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35287                                          retn			;
 35288                                  
 35289                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35290                                  ;
 35291                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35292                                  ;
 35293                                  ;   INPUT
 35294                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35295                                  ;
 35296                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35297                                  ;       None
 35298                                  ;
 35299                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35300                                  ;       None
 35301                                  ;
 35302                                  ;   HISTORY
 35303                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35304                                  ;
 35305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35306                                  
 35307                                  set_numlock:
 35308                                          push    ax
 35309                                          push    ds
 35310                                          sub     ax,ax
 35311                                          mov     ds,ax
 35312                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35313                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35314                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 35315                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35316                                          jmp     short set_done
 35317                                  not_off:
 35318                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35319                                          stc
 35320                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 35321                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 35322                                  set_done:
 35323                                          pop     ds
 35324                                          pop     ax
 35325                                          retn
 35326                                  
 35327                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35328                                  
 35329                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35330                                  ;
 35331                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35332                                  ;
 35333                                  ;   INPUT
 35334                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35335                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35336                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35337                                  ;
 35338                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35339                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35340                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35341                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35342                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35343                                  ;
 35344                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35345                                  ;       All
 35346                                  ;
 35347                                  ;   NOTES
 35348                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35349                                  ;
 35350                                  ;   HISTORY
 35351                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35352                                  ;
 35353                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35354                                  
 35355                                  menu_check:
 35356                                  
 35357                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 35358                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35359                                  
 35360                                          push    cx              ;
 35361                                          push    si              ;
 35362                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35363                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35364                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35365                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35366                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35367                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35368                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35369                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35370                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35371                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35372                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35373                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35374                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35375                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35376                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35377                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35378                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35379                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35380                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35381                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35382                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35383                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35384                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35385                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35386                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35387                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35388                                          call    get_char        ;
 35389                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35390                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35391                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35392                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35393                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35394                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35395                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35396                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35397                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35398                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35399                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 35400                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35401                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 35402                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 35403                                          pop     si              ;
 35404                                          pop     cx              ;
 35405                                  
 35406                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 35407                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 35408
