 35409                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35410                                          jnz	short menu_search
 35411                                  ;
 35412                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35413                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 35414                                  ;
 35415                                          call    kbd_read
 35416                                          jnc	short menu_search
 35417                                          jmp	menu_abort
 35418                                  
 35419                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 35420                                  
 35421                                  menu_search:
 35422                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 35423                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 35424                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 35425                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 35426                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 35427                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 35428                                  
 35429                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 35430                                  
 35431                                  menu_color:
 35432                                          push    cx              ;
 35433                                          push    dx              ;
 35434                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 35435                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 35436                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35437                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35438                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 35439                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35440                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 35441                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 35442                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 35443                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 35444                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 35445                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 35446                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35447                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 35448                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35449                                  check_color:                    ;
 35450                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 35451                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 35452                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35453                                  set_color:
 35454                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 35455                                          pop     dx              ;
 35456                                          pop     cx              ;
 35457                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 35458                                  
 35459                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 35460                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 35461                                  
 35462                                  menu_found:
 35463                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 35464                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 35465                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35466                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 35467                                  
 35468                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 35469                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 35470                                  
 35471                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 35472                                  
 35473                                  menu_process:
 35474                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35475                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 35476                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35477                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 35478                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 35479                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35480                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 35481                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 35482                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 35483                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 35484                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 35485                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 35486                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 35487                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35488                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 35489                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 35490                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35491                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 35492                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35493                                          stc                     ;
 35494                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 35495                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35496                                  menu_numlock:
 35497                                          call    set_numlock
 35498                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35499                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 35500                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 35501                                  
 35502                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 35503                                  
 35504                                  menu_default:
 35505                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 35506                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 35507                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 35508                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 35509                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 35510                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 35511                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 35512                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 35513                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 35514                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 35515                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35516                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 35517                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 35518                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 35519                                  timeout_skip:
 35520                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35521                                  
 35522                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35523                                  
 35524                                  menu_item:
 35525                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 35526                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 35527                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 35528                                          call    srch_block      ;
 35529                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 35530                                          stc                     ;
 35531                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 35532                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 35533                                  
 35534                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35535                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 35536                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 35537                                  
 35538                                  menu_itemfound:
 35539                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 35540                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 35541                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 35542                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 35543                                  
 35544                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 35545                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 35546                                  ;   description...
 35547                                  
 35548                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 35549                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 35550                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 35551                                          call    skip_token      ;
 35552                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35553                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 35554                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35555                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 35556                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 35557                                  
 35558                                  menu_nextitem:
 35559                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35560                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 35561                                  
 35562                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 35563                                  
 35564                                  menu_getdefault:
 35565                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 35566                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 35567                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 35568                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 35569                                  menu_valid:
 35570                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 35571                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 35572                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 35573                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 35574                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 35575                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 35576                                  menu_chkdefault:
 35577                                          push    bx              ;
 35578                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35579                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35580                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 35581                                          push    ds              ;
 35582                                          push    es              ;
 35583                                          pop     ds              ;
 35584                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 35585                                          pop     ds              ;
 35586                                          pop     bx              ;
 35587                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 35588                                          inc     bx              ;
 35589                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 35590                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 35591                                  menu_nodefault:
 35592                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 35593                                  menu_setdefault:
 35594                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 35595                                  
 35596                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 35597                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 35598                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 35599                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 35600                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 35601                                  ;   with no timeout)
 35602                                  
 35603                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 35604                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 35605                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 35606                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 35607                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 35608                                  
 35609                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 35610                                  
 35611                                  menu_display:
 35612                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 35613                                          int     10h             ;
 35614                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 35615                                          int     10h             ;
 35616                                          push    es              ;
 35617                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 35618                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 35619                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 35620                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 35621                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 35622                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 35623                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 35624                                          int     10h             ;
 35625                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 35626                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 35627                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 35628                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 35629                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 35630                                  	dec     dl              ;
 35631                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 35632                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 35633                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 35634                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 35635                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 35636                                  menu_clear:
 35637                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 35638                                          pop     es              ;
 35639                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 35640                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 35641                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 35642                                  
 35643                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35644                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 35645                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35646                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 35647                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 35648                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 35649                                          int     10h             ;
 35650                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 35651                                          call    print           ;
 35652                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 35653                                          int     10h             ;
 35654                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35655                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35656                                  
 35657                                  menu_nostatus:
 35658                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35659                                  menu_disploop:
 35660                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35661                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35662                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35663                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35664                                  
 35665                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35666                                  
 35667                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35668                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35669                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 35670                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35671                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35672                                          int     10h             ;
 35673                                  
 35674                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 35675                                          call    print           ;
 35676                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 35677                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 35678                                          call    print           ;
 35679                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 35680                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35681                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 35682                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 35683                                  
 35684                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 35685                                  
 35686                                  menu_autoselect:
 35687                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 35688                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 35689                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 35690                                  menu_abort:
 35691                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 35692                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 35693                                  
 35694                                  normal_boot:
 35695                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 35696                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 35697                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 35698                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35699                                          jmp     menu_search
 35700                                  
 35701                                  not_topmenu:
 35702                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35703                                          jne	short not_submenu
 35704                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35705                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35706                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35707                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35708                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35709                                          jmp     menu_found
 35710                                  
 35711                                  not_submenu:
 35712                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35713                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35714                                  
 35715                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35716                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35717                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35718                                  
 35719                                  no_selection:
 35720                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 35721                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35722                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35723                                          push    ds              ;
 35724                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35725                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35726                                  
 35727                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35728                                  ;
 35729                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35730                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35731                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35732                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 35733                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35734                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35735                                  ;
 35736                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35737                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35738                                  
 35739                                  copyblock_loop:
 35740                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35741                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35742                                          pop     bx              ;
 35743                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35744                                  
 35745                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 35746                                  
 35747                                  copyblock_begin:
 35748                                          push    ax              ;
 35749                                          push    cx              ;
 35750                                          push    si              ;
 35751                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 35752                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35753                                          push    ds              ;
 35754                                          push    cs              ;
 35755                                          pop     ds              ;
 35756                                          call    comp_names      ;
 35757                                          pop     ds              ;
 35758                                          pop     di              ;
 35759                                          pop     si              ;
 35760                                          pop     cx              ;
 35761                                          pop     ax              ;
 35762                                          je	short copyblock_check
 35763                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 35764                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 35765                                          push    di              ;
 35766                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 35767                                          push    ds              ;
 35768                                          push    es              ;
 35769                                          pop     ds              ;
 35770                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 35771                                          pop     ds              ;
 35772                                          pop     di              ;
 35773                                  copyblock_check:
 35774                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35775                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 35776                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35777                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 35778                                  
 35779                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 35780                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 35781                                          call    get_char        ;
 35782                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35783                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35784                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35785                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 35786                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 35787                                  ;
 35788                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 35789                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 35790                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 35791                                  ;
 35792                                  move_config:
 35793                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 35794                                          push    cx              ;
 35795                                  ;
 35796                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 35797                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 35798                                  ;
 35799                                   	;mov	cx,7
 35800                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 35801                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 35802                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 35803                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 35804                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 35805                                  copy_boot: 
 35806                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 35807                                          cs
 35808                                  	lodsb
 35809                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 35810                                          inc     di              ;
 35811                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 35812                                  
 35813                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 35814                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 35815                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 35816                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 35817                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 35818                                          push    cs              ;
 35819                                          pop     es              ;
 35820                                          mov     si,szCommon
 35821                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 35822                                          call    any_delim       ;
 35823                                          je	short l2	;
 35824                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35825                                          inc     si              ;
 35826                                          inc     di              ;
 35827                                          loop    l1              ;
 35828                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 35829                                          pop     es              ;
 35830                                  
 35831                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 35832                                  
 35833                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35834                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35835                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35836                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 35837                                  
 35838                                          push    cx              ;
 35839                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 35840                                          pop     cx              ;
 35841                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 35842                                          pop     ds              ;
 35843                                  
 35844                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 35845                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 35846                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 35847                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 35848                                  ;   is empty.
 35849                                  
 35850                                          push    es              ;
 35851                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35852                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35853                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35854                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35855                                          pop     es
 35856                                  
 35857                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35858                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35859                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35860                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35861                                  
 35862                                  menu_done:
 35863                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35864                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 35865                                          push    es              ;
 35866                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35867                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35868                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35869                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35870                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35871                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35872                                          pop     es              ;
 35873                                  menu_exit:
 35874                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35875                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35876                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35877                                          retn
 35878                                  
 35879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35880                                  ;
 35881                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35882                                  ;
 35883                                  ;   INPUT
 35884                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35885                                  ;
 35886                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35887                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35888                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35889                                  ;
 35890                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35891                                  ;       None
 35892                                  ;
 35893                                  ;   NOTES
 35894                                  ;       None
 35895                                  ;
 35896                                  ;   HISTORY
 35897                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35898                                  ;
 35899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35900                                  
 35901                                  copy_envvar:
 35902                                          push    cx              ;
 35903                                          push    si              ;
 35904                                          push    ds              ;
 35905                                          push    es              ;
 35906                                          push    es              ;
 35907                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35908                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35909                                  
 35910                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35911                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35912                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35913                                  ;
 35914                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35915                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35916                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35917                                  
 35918                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 35919                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35920                                          lodsb                   ;
 35921                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35922                                          stc                     ;
 35923                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35924                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 35925                                          stc                     ;
 35926                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35927                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 35928                                          stc                     ;
 35929                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35930                                          inc     cx              ;
 35931                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 35932                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 35933                                          mov     al,0            ;
 35934                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35935                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35936                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35937                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35938                                  copy_varsrch:
 35939                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35940                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35941                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35942                                          push    cx              ;
 35943                                          push    si              ;
 35944                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 35945                                          pop     si              ;
 35946                                          pop     cx              ;
 35947                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35948                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35949                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35950                                  
 35951                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35952                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35953                                  
 35954                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35955                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35956                                          push    si              ;
 35957                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35958                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 35959                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35960                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35961                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 35962                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 35963                                  
 35964                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 35965                                  	es	; 26h
 35966                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 35967                                  
 35968                                  	pop     si
 35969                                  copy_envprep:
 35970                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 35971                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 35972                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 35973                                          je	short copy_envdel
 35974                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35975                                  
 35976                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 35977                                          push    cx              ;
 35978                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35979                                          repne   scasb           ;
 35980                                          pop     cx              ;
 35981                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 35982                                  
 35983                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 35984                                          lodsb                   ;
 35985                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 35986                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35987                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 35988                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35989                                          stosb                   ;
 35990                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35991                                  
 35992                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 35993                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 35994                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 35995                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 35996                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 35997                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35998                                  
 35999                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36000                                          pop     es              ;
 36001                                          pop     ds              ;
 36002                                          pop     si              ;
 36003                                          pop     cx              ;
 36004                                  
 36005                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36006                                          retn
 36007                                  
 36008                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36009                                  ;
 36010                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36011                                  ;
 36012                                  ;   INPUT
 36013                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36014                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36015                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36016                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36017                                  ;
 36018                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36019                                  ;       Same as above
 36020                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36021                                  ;
 36022                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36023                                  ;       All
 36024                                  ;
 36025                                  ;   NOTES
 36026                                  ;       None
 36027                                  ;
 36028                                  ;   HISTORY
 36029                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36030                                  ;
 36031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36032                                  
 36033                                  copy_block:
 36034                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36035                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 36036                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36037                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36038                                          je	short copy_done ;
 36039                                  
 36040                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36041                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36042                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36043                                  
 36044                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36045                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36046                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36047                                  
 36048                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36049                                          push    di              ;
 36050                                  
 36051                                          mov     di,szMenu
 36052                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36053                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 36054                                  
 36055                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36056                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36057                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 36058                                  
 36059                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36060                                          call    srch_block      ;
 36061                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 36062                                          pop     di              ;
 36063                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36064                                          push    cx              ;
 36065                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 36066                                          push    si              ;
 36067                                          dec     dx              ;
 36068                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 36069                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36070                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36071                                          pop     si              ;
 36072                                          pop     cx              ;
 36073                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36074                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 36075                                  
 36076                                  copy_skip:
 36077                                          pop     di
 36078                                  copy_error:
 36079                                          clc                     ;
 36080                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36081                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 36082                                  
 36083                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36084                                  
 36085                                  copy_line:
 36086                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 36087                                          inc     di              ;
 36088                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36089                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36090                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36091                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36092                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36093                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36094                                          inc     di              ;
 36095                                          inc     di              ;
 36096                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 36097                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36098                                          call    get_char        ;
 36099                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36100                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 36101                                          inc     di              ;
 36102                                  copy_next:
 36103                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36104                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36105                                  
 36106                                  copy_nextline:
 36107                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36108                                          jmp     short copy_block
 36109                                  
 36110                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36111                                  ;copy_done:
 36112                                          ;retn
 36113                                  
 36114                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36115                                  ;
 36116                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36117                                  ;
 36118                                  ;   INPUT
 36119                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36120                                  ;
 36121                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36122                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36123                                  ;
 36124                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36125                                  ;       DX
 36126                                  ;
 36127                                  ;   NOTES
 36128                                  ;       None
 36129                                  ;
 36130                                  ;   HISTORY
 36131                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36132                                  ;
 36133                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36134                                  
 36135                                  get_linenum:
 36136                                          push    ax              ;
 36137                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36138                                          push    cx              ;
 36139                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36140                                          push    si              ;
 36141                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36142                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36143                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36144                                          call    skip_line       ;
 36145                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 36146                                          inc     bx              ;
 36147                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36148                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36149                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36150                                          pop     si              ;
 36151                                          pop     cx              ;
 36152                                          pop     ax              ;
 36153                                          retn
 36154                                  
 36155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36156                                  ;
 36157                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36158                                  ;
 36159                                  ;   INPUT
 36160                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36161                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36162                                  ;
 36163                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36164                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36165                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36166                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36167                                  ;
 36168                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36169                                  ;       None
 36170                                  ;
 36171                                  ;   NOTES
 36172                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36173                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36174                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36175                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36176                                  ;
 36177                                  ;   HISTORY
 36178                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36179                                  ;
 36180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36181                                  
 36182                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36183                                          push    ax              ;
 36184                                          push    cx              ;
 36185                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36186                                          push    si              ;
 36187                                          sub     si,si           ;
 36188                                          push    ds              ;
 36189                                          push    es              ;
 36190                                          pop     ds              ;
 36191                                          call    find_block      ;
 36192                                          mov     di,si           ;
 36193                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 36194                                          pop     ds              ;
 36195                                          pop     si              ;
 36196                                          pop     cx              ;
 36197                                          pop     ax              ;
 36198                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36199                                          retn			;
 36200                                  
 36201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36202                                  ;
 36203                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36204                                  ;
 36205                                  ;   INPUT
 36206                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36207                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36208                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36209                                  ;
 36210                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36211                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36212                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36213                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36214                                  ;
 36215                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36216                                  ;       AX
 36217                                  ;
 36218                                  ;   NOTES
 36219                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 36220                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 36221                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 36222                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 36223                                  ;
 36224                                  ;   HISTORY
 36225                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36226                                  ;
 36227                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36228                                  
 36229                                  find_block:
 36230                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 36231                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 36232                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 36233                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 36234                                          je	short check_line ; no
 36235                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 36236                                          jne	short next_line	;
 36237                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36238                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 36239                                  check_line:
 36240                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36241                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 36242                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 36243                                  next_line:
 36244                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 36245                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 36246                                  ;find_exit:
 36247                                  ;	retn
 36248                                  
 36249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36250                                  ;
 36251                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 36252                                  ;
 36253                                  ;   INPUT
 36254                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 36255                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36256                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36257                                  ;
 36258                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36259                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 36260                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36261                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36262                                  ;
 36263                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36264                                  ;       AX
 36265                                  ;
 36266                                  ;   NOTES
 36267                                  ;       None
 36268                                  ;
 36269                                  ;   HISTORY
 36270                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36271                                  ;
 36272                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36273                                  
 36274                                  comp_names:
 36275                                          push    di              ;
 36276                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 36277                                          call    get_char        ;
 36278                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 36279                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 36280                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 36281                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 36282                                          inc     di              ;
 36283                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 36284                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 36285                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 36286                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 36287                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 36288                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 36289                                          pop     di              ;
 36290                                          retn			;
 36291                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 36292                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 36293                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 36294                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 36295                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 36296                                  
 36297                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36298                                  
 36299                                  comp_names_safe:
 36300                                          push    ax
 36301                                          push    cx
 36302                                          push	si
 36303                                          push    ds
 36304                                          push    cs
 36305                                          pop     ds
 36306                                          call    comp_names
 36307                                          pop     ds
 36308                                  	pop	si
 36309                                          pop     cx
 36310                                          pop     ax
 36311                                          retn
 36312                                  
 36313                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36314                                  ;
 36315                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 36316                                  ;
 36317                                  ;   INPUT
 36318                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 36319                                  ;
 36320                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36321                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 36322                                  ;
 36323                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36324                                  ;       None
 36325                                  ;
 36326                                  ;   NOTES
 36327                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 36328                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 36329                                  ;
 36330                                  ;   HISTORY
 36331                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36332                                  ;
 36333                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36334                                  
 36335                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 36336                                          push    ax              ;
 36337                                          push    bx              ;
 36338                                          push    cx              ;
 36339                                          push    dx              ;
 36340                                          push    si              ;
 36341                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36342                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 36343                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 36344                                          push    dx              ; save it
 36345                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36346                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 36347                                          add     dh,3            ;
 36348                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 36349                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 36350                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 36351                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 36352                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 36353                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 36354                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 36355                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 36356                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 36357                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 36358                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 36359                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 36360                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 36361                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36362                                  print_other:                    ;
 36363                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 36364                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 36365                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 36366                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 36367                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 36368                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 36369                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 36370                                          int     10h             ;
 36371                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36372                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36373                                          int     10h             ;
 36374                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 36375                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 36376                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 36377                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36378                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36379                                          int     10h             ;
 36380                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 36381                                          mov	ax,0920h
 36382                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 36383                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36384                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36385                                          int     10h             ;
 36386                                          push    es              ;
 36387                                  print_loop:                     ;
 36388                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 36389                                          inc     di              ;
 36390                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 36391                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 36392                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 36393                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 36394                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 36395                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 36396                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 36397                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 36398                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 36399                                          int     10h             ;
 36400                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36401                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 36402                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 36403                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36404                                          int     10h             ;
 36405                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 36406                                  print_done:                     ;
 36407                                          pop     es              ;
 36408                                          pop     dx              ;
 36409                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36410                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 36411                                          pop     si              ;
 36412                                          pop     dx              ;
 36413                                          pop     cx              ;
 36414                                          pop     bx              ;
 36415                                          pop     ax              ;
 36416                                          retn			;
 36417                                  
 36418                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36419                                  ;
 36420                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 36421                                  ;
 36422                                  ;   INPUT
 36423                                  ;       None
 36424                                  ;
 36425                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36426                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 36427                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 36428                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 36429                                  ;
 36430                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36431                                  ;       None
 36432                                  ;
 36433                                  ;   NOTES
 36434                                  ;       None
 36435                                  ;
 36436                                  ;   HISTORY
 36437                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36438                                  ;
 36439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36440                                  
 36441                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 36442                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 36443                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 36444                                          call    disp_num        ;
