 36445                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 36446                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36447                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 36448                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 36449                                          int     21h             ;
 36450                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 36451                                  check_time:
 36452                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 36453                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 36454                                          jae	short show_time	;
 36455                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 36456                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 36457                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 36458                                  show_time:
 36459                                          push    bx              ;
 36460                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 36461                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36462                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36463                                          int     10h             ;
 36464                                          push    dx              ;
 36465                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 36466                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36467                                          int     10h             ;
 36468                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 36469                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 36470                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 36471                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 36472                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 36473                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 36474                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 36475                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 36476                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36477                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36478                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 36479                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 36480                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36481                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36482                                          pop     dx
 36483                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 36484                                          int     10h             ;
 36485                                          pop     bx              ;
 36486                                  input_key:
 36487                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 36488                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 36489                                          int     21h             ;
 36490                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 36491                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 36492                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 36493                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 36494                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 36495                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 36496                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 36497                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 36498                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 36499                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 36500                                  got_time:
 36501                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 36502                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 36503                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 36504                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 36505                                  got_key:
 36506                                          push    ax              ;
 36507                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 36508                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 36509                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 36510                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 36511                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 36512                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36513                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36514                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 36515                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 36516                                          pop     bx   		;
 36517                                  
 36518                                  timeout_disabled:
 36519                                          pop     ax              ;
 36520                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 36521                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 36522                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 36523                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36524                                  
 36525                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36526                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 36527                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36528                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36529                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36530                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36531                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36532                                          jmp     short print1
 36533                                  not_up:
 36534                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36535                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 36536                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36537                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36538                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36539                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36540                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36541                                  print1: 
 36542                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 36543                                  print2: 
 36544                                  	call    print_item      ;
 36545                                          call    disp_num        ;
 36546                                  to_input_key:
 36547                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 36548                                  not_down:
 36549                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36550                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36551                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36552                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 36553                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36554                                          call    show_status     ;
 36555                                          jmp     input_key	;
 36556                                  not_f8:
 36557                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36558                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36559                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36560                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36561                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36562                                  
 36563                                  normal_key:
 36564                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36565                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 36566                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36567                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36568                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36569                                          retn			;
 36570                                  not_backspace:
 36571                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36572                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36573                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36574                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36575                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36576                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36577                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36578                                          jmp	short print2
 36579                                  
 36580                                  select_done:
 36581                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 36582                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 36583                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36584                                  
 36585                                  	; fall into disp_input
 36586                                  
 36587                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36588                                  
 36589                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36590                                  ;
 36591                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 36592                                  ;
 36593                                  ;   INPUT
 36594                                  ;       AL == character to display
 36595                                  ;
 36596                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36597                                  ;       None
 36598                                  ;
 36599                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36600                                  ;       None
 36601                                  ;
 36602                                  ;   NOTES
 36603                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 36604                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36605                                  ;
 36606                                  ;   HISTORY
 36607                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36608                                  ;
 36609                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36610                                  
 36611                                  disp_input:
 36612                                          push    ax
 36613                                          cmp     al,' '
 36614                                          jae	short disp_ok
 36615                                          mov     al,' '
 36616                                  disp_ok:
 36617                                          mov     dl,al
 36618                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36619                                          int     21h
 36620                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 36621                                          call    print
 36622                                          pop     ax
 36623                                          retn
 36624                                  
 36625                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36626                                  
 36627                                  disp_num:
 36628                                          push    bx
 36629                                          add     al,'0'
 36630                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 36631                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36632                                          mov     cx,1
 36633                                          int     10h
 36634                                          pop     bx
 36635                                          retn
 36636                                  
 36637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36638                                  ;
 36639                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 36640                                  ;
 36641                                  ;   INPUT
 36642                                  ;       None
 36643                                  ;
 36644                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36645                                  ;       None
 36646                                  ;
 36647                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36648                                  ;       None
 36649                                  ;
 36650                                  ;   NOTES
 36651                                  ;       None
 36652                                  ;
 36653                                  ;   HISTORY
 36654                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36655                                  ;
 36656                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36657                                  
 36658                                  show_status:
 36659                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36660                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36661                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36662                                          int     10h             ;
 36663                                          push    dx              ; save it
 36664                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36665                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 36666                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36667                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 36668                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 36669                                          int     10h             ;
 36670                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36671                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 36672                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 36673                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 36674                                  show_onoff: 
 36675                                          int     10h
 36676                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36677                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 36678                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 36679                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 36680                                  
 36681                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 36682                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 36683                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 36684                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 36685                                  show_noton:                     ;
 36686                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 36687                                          int     10h             ;
 36688                                  show_done:                      ;
 36689                                          pop     dx              ;
 36690                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36691                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 36692                                          pop     bx              ;
 36693                                          retn			;
 36694                                  
 36695                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36696                                  
 36697                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36698                                  ;
 36699                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36700                                  ;
 36701                                  ;   INPUT
 36702                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36703                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36704                                  ;
 36705                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36706                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36707                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36708                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36709                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36710                                  ;
 36711                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36712                                  ;       AX
 36713                                  ;
 36714                                  ;   NOTES
 36715                                  ;       None
 36716                                  ;
 36717                                  ;   HISTORY
 36718                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36719                                  ;
 36720                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36721                                  
 36722                                  skip_token:
 36723                                          call    get_char
 36724                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 36725                                          call    any_delim
 36726                                          jne	short skip_token
 36727                                  skip_check_eol:
 36728                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36729                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36730                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36731                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36732                                          clc
 36733                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36734                                  	retn
 36735                                  skip_token_eol:
 36736                                          stc
 36737                                  skip_token_done:
 36738                                          retn
 36739                                  
 36740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36741                                  ;
 36742                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36743                                  ;
 36744                                  ;   INPUT
 36745                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36746                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36747                                  ;
 36748                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36749                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36750                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36751                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36752                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36753                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36754                                  ;
 36755                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36756                                  ;       AX
 36757                                  ;
 36758                                  ;   NOTES
 36759                                  ;       None
 36760                                  ;
 36761                                  ;   HISTORY
 36762                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36763                                  ;
 36764                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36765                                  
 36766                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36767                                          call    get_char        ;
 36768                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36769                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36770                                          call    delim           ;
 36771                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 36772                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36773                                  
 36774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36775                                  ;
 36776                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36777                                  ;
 36778                                  ;   INPUT
 36779                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36780                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36781                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36782                                  ;
 36783                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36784                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36785                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36786                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36787                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36788                                  ;
 36789                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36790                                  ;       AX
 36791                                  ;
 36792                                  ;   NOTES
 36793                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36794                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36795                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36796                                  ;
 36797                                  ;   HISTORY
 36798                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36799                                  ;
 36800                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36801                                  
 36802                                  skip_opt_line:
 36803                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36804                                          je	short skip_line_done
 36805                                       
 36806                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36807                                  
 36808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36809                                  ;
 36810                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36811                                  ;
 36812                                  ;   INPUT
 36813                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36814                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36815                                  ;
 36816                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36817                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36818                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36819                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36820                                  ;
 36821                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36822                                  ;       AX
 36823                                  ;
 36824                                  ;   NOTES
 36825                                  ;       None
 36826                                  ;
 36827                                  ;   HISTORY
 36828                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36829                                  ;
 36830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36831                                  
 36832                                  skip_line:
 36833                                          call    get_char
 36834                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 36835                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36836                                          jne	short skip_line
 36837                                  skip_line_done:
 36838                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36839                                          retn
 36840                                  
 36841                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36842                                  ;
 36843                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36844                                  ;
 36845                                  ;   INPUT
 36846                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36847                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36848                                  ;
 36849                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36850                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36851                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36852                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36853                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36854                                  ;
 36855                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36856                                  ;       AX
 36857                                  ;
 36858                                  ;   NOTES
 36859                                  ;       None
 36860                                  ;
 36861                                  ;   HISTORY
 36862                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36863                                  ;
 36864                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36865                                  
 36866                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36867                                  
 36868                                  get_number:
 36869                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36870                                  num_loop:
 36871                                          call    get_char        ;
 36872                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36873                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36874                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36875                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36876                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36877                                          push    ax              ;
 36878                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36879                                          push    dx              ;
 36880                                          mul     bx              ;
 36881                                          pop     dx              ;
 36882                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36883                                          pop     ax              ;
 36884                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36885                                          cbw                     ;
 36886                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36887                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36888                                  
 36889                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36890                                  ;num_done:
 36891                                          ;retn
 36892                                  
 36893                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36894                                  ;
 36895                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36896                                  ;
 36897                                  ;   INPUT
 36898                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36899                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36900                                  ;
 36901                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36902                                  ;       AL == next character
 36903                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36904                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36905                                  ;
 36906                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36907                                  ;       AX
 36908                                  ;
 36909                                  ;   NOTES
 36910                                  ;       None
 36911                                  ;
 36912                                  ;   HISTORY
 36913                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36914                                  ;
 36915                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36916                                  
 36917                                  get_char:
 36918                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36919                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36920                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36921                                  	es	
 36922                                  	lodsb
 36923                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36924                                          retn			;
 36925                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36926                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36927                                  nearby_ret:
 36928                                          retn
 36929                                  
 36930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36931                                  ;
 36932                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36933                                  ;
 36934                                  ;   INPUT
 36935                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36936                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36937                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36938                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36939                                  ;
 36940                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36941                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36942                                  ;
 36943                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36944                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36945                                  ;
 36946                                  ;   NOTES
 36947                                  ;       None
 36948                                  ;
 36949                                  ;   HISTORY
 36950                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36951                                  ;
 36952                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36953                                  
 36954                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36955                                  query_user:
 36956                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36957                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36958                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36959                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36960                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36961                                  qu_1:
 36962                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36963                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36964                                          push    ax                      ;
 36965                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36966                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36967                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36968                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36969                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36970                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36971                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36972                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36973                                  query_all:
 36974                                  
 36975                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36976                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36977                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36978                                  
 36979                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36980                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36981                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36982                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36983                                  
 36984                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36985                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36986                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36987                                  find_match:                             ;
 36988                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36989                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36990                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36991                                          inc     di                      ;
 36992                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36993                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36994                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36995                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36996                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36997                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36998                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36999                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 37000                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37001                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37002                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37003                                          inc     di                      ;
 37004                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 37005                                          int     21h                     ;
 37006                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 37007                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37008                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37009                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37010                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37011                                  cmd_notset:
 37012                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37013                                  line_print:                             ;
 37014                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37015                                          es
 37016                                  	lodsb
 37017                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 37018                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 37019                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 37020                                  non_null:                               ;
 37021                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37022                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37023                                          jne	short non_space		;
 37024                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 37025                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 37026                                  non_space:                              ;
 37027                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 37028                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37029                                          int     21h                     ;
 37030                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 37031                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37032                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37033                                  
 37034                                  generic_prompt:
 37035                                          call    print                   ;
 37036                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37037                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37038                                          int     16h                     ;
 37039                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37040                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 37041                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37042                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 37043                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37044                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37045                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37046                                  not_func:
 37047                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37048                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37049                                          je	short legal_char	;
 37050                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37051                                          je	short legal_char	;
 37052                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37053                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37054                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37055                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 37056                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37057                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 37058                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37059                                          call    disp_input              ;
 37060                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37061                                  
 37062                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37063                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37064                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37065                                  	clc
 37066                                  do_cmd:
 37067                                  	pop     ax			;
 37068                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37069                                  	; cf=0
 37070                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37071                                  	retn
 37072                                  
 37073                                  skip_cmd:
 37074                                  	pop     ax			;
 37075                                  skip_all:
 37076                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37077                                  	stc
 37078                                  	retn
 37079                                  
 37080                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37081                                  ;
 37082                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 37083                                  ;
 37084                                  ;   INPUT
 37085                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 37086                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37087                                  ;
 37088                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37089                                  ;       None
 37090                                  ;
 37091                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37092                                  ;       None
 37093                                  ;
 37094                                  ;   NOTES
 37095                                  ;       None
 37096                                  ;
 37097                                  ;   HISTORY
 37098                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37099                                  ;
 37100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37101                                  
 37102                                  print_error:
 37103                                          push    ax
 37104                                          push    bx
 37105                                          push    cx
 37106                                          push    dx
 37107                                          push    ds
 37108                                          push    cs
 37109                                          pop     ds
 37110                                          pushf
 37111                                          call    get_linenum
 37112                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 37113                                          call    error_line
 37114                                          popf
 37115                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 37116                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 37117                                          call    print
 37118                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 37119                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 37120                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 37121                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 37122                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 37123                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 37124                                  pe_1:     
 37125                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 37126                                          call    print
 37127                                  pe_ret: 
 37128                                  	pop     ds
 37129                                          pop     dx
 37130                                          pop     cx
 37131                                          pop     bx
 37132                                          pop     ax
 37133                                  	retn
 37134                                  
 37135                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37136                                  
 37137                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37138                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 37139                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37140                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37141                                  
 37142                                  disable_autoexec:
 37143                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37144                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37145                                  
 37146                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37147                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 37148                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37149                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 37150                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37151                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37152                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37153                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37154                                  dae_1:
 37155                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37156                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37157                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37158                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37159                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37160                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37161                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 37162                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 37163                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 37164                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 37165                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 37166                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 37167                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 37168                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 37169                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 37170                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 37171                                          dec     bx                      ;
 37172                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 37173                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 37174                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 37175                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 37176                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 37177                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 37178                                          retn
 37179                                  
 37180                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 37181                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37182                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 37183                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 37184                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 37185                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 37186                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 37187                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 37188                                  
 37189                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 37190                                  
 37191                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 37192

 37197                                  ;
 37198                                  ; procedure : delim
 37199                                  ;
 37200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37201                                  
 37202                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37203                                  ;
 37204                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37205                                  ;
 37206                                  ;any_delim:
 37207                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 37208                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37209                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 37210                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37211                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 37212                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37213                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 37214                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37215                                  ;
 37216                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 37217                                  
 37218                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37219                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 37220                                  delim:
 37221 00002FAF 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 37222 00002FB1 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 37223                                  
 37224 00002FB3 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 37225 00002FB5 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 37226                                  
 37227                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 37228 00002FB7 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 37229 00002FB9 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 37230 00002FBB 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 37231 00002FBD 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 37232 00002FBF 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 37233 00002FC1 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 37234 00002FC3 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 37235 00002FC5 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 37236 00002FC7 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 37237                                  
 37238                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37239                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37240                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 37241 00002FC9 F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 37242                                  ;endif
 37243                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37244                                  delim_ret:
 37245                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 37246 00002FCA C3                      	retn

 37258 00002FCE 72FA                    	jc	short nl_ret
 37259 00002FD0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 37260 00002FD2 75F7                    	jne	short newline

 37263                                  	;call	getchr
 37264                                  ;nl_ret:
 37265                                  	;retn
 37266                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37267                                  	;jmp	short getchr

 37287

 37309                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 37310                                  ;
 37311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37312                                  
 37313                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37314                                  mapcase:
 37315 00002FEB 51                      	push	cx
 37316 00002FEC 56                      	push	si
 37317 00002FED 1E                      	push	ds
 37318                                  
 37319 00002FEE 06                      	push	es
 37320 00002FEF 1F                      	pop	ds
 37321                                  
 37322                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37323                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37324                                  ;
 37325                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 37326                                  ;;else
 37327                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 37328                                  ;;endif
 37329                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37330 00002FF0 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 37331                                  
 37332                                  convloop:
 37333 00002FF2 AC                      	lodsb
 37334 00002FF3 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 37335 00002FF5 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 37336 00002FF7 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 37337 00002FF9 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 37338 00002FFB 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 37339 00002FFD 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 37340                                  noconv:
 37341                                  
 37342                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37343                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37344                                  ;;
 37345                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 37346                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 37347                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 37348                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 37349                                  ;;
 37350                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 37351                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 37352                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 37353                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 37354                                  ;check_eol:
 37355                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 37356                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37357                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 37358                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37359                                  ;;endif
 37360                                  	
 37361                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37362 00003000 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 37363                                  convdone:
 37364 00003002 1F                      	pop	ds
 37365 00003003 5E                      	pop	si
 37366 00003004 59                      	pop	cx
 37367 00003005 C3                      	retn

 37370                                  ;
 37371                                  ; procedure : round
 37372                                  ;
 37373                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 37374                                  ; perform bounds check.
 37375                                  ;
 37376                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37377                                  
 37378                                  round:
 37379                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37380 00003006 1E                      	push	ds
 37381 00003007 0E                      	push	cs
 37382 00003008 1F                      	pop	ds
 37383                                  
 37384 00003009 50                      	push	ax
 37385                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 37386 0000300A A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 37387                                  
 37388 0000300D E88AE0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 37389                                  
 37390                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 37391 00003010 0106[E003]              	add	[memhi],ax
 37392                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 37393 00003014 C706[DE03]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 37394                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 37395 0000301A A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 37396                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 37397 0000301D 3B06[A302]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 37398                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 37399                                  	; 17/09/2023
 37400 00003021 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 37401                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 37402 00003023 F606[0614]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 37403 00003028 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 37404 0000302A 06                      	push	es
 37405 0000302B 56                      	push	si
 37406                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 37407 0000302C 8B36[0414]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 37408 00003030 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 37409 00003032 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 37410 00003034 48                      	dec	ax
 37411                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 37412 00003035 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 37413                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 37414 00003039 8026[0614]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 37415 0000303E 5E                      	pop	si
 37416 0000303F 07                      	pop	es
 37417                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 37418 00003040 58                      	pop	ax
 37419                                  
 37420                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37421 00003041 1F                      	pop	ds
 37422                                  
 37423                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37424                                  	; cf = 0
 37425                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37426                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 37427 00003042 C3                      	retn
 37428                                  
 37429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37430                                  
 37431                                  mem_err:

 37433 00003043 0E                      	push	cs
 37434 00003044 1F                      	pop	ds
 37435                                  mem_err2:
 37436 00003045 BA[2737]                	mov	dx,badmem
 37437                                  	;push	cs
 37438                                  	;pop	ds
 37439 00003048 E83102                  	call	print
 37440 0000304B E9F6D7                  	jmp	stall
