 37442                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37443                                  ;
 37444                                  ; procedure : calldev
 37445                                  ;
 37446                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37447                                  
 37448                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37449                                  	; (SYSINIT:34E0h)
 37450                                  calldev:
 37451 0000304E 2E8E1E[5E1E]            	mov	ds,[cs:DevEntry+2]
 37452 00003053 2E031E[5C1E]            	add	bx,[cs:DevEntry]	; do a little relocation
 37453 00003058 8B07                    	mov	ax,[bx]
 37454                                  
 37455 0000305A 2EFF36[5C1E]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 37456 0000305F 2EA3[5C1E]              	mov	[cs:DevEntry],ax
 37457 00003063 BB[E603]                	mov	bx,packet
 37458 00003066 2EFF1E[5C1E]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 37459 0000306B 2E8F06[5C1E]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 37460 00003070 C3                      	retn
 37461                                  
 37462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37463                                  ;
 37464                                  ; procedure : todigit
 37465                                  ;
 37466                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37467                                  
 37468                                  todigit:
 37469 00003071 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 37470                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 37471                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37472 00003073 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 37473                                  	;cmp	al,9
 37474                                  	;ja	short notdig
 37475                                  	;clc
 37476                                  	;retn
 37477                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37478 00003075 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 37479 00003077 F5                      	cmc
 37480                                  notdig:
 37481                                  	;stc
 37482                                  notdig2:
 37483 00003078 C3                      	retn
 37484                                  
 37485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37486                                  ;
 37487                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37488                                  ;
 37489                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37490                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37491                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37492                                  ;
 37493                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37494                                  
 37495                                  getnum:
 37496 00003079 53                      	push	bx
 37497 0000307A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37498                                  b2:
 37499 0000307C E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37500 0000307F 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37501                                  
 37502 00003081 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37503 00003082 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37504                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37505                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37506 00003083 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37507 00003085 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37508 00003087 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37509 00003088 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37510 0000308A 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37511 0000308D 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37512                                  
 37513 0000308F 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37514                                  
 37515 00003090 E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 37516 00003093 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37517 00003095 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37518 00003097 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37519 00003099 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37520 0000309B 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37521 0000309D 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37522 0000309F 7417                    	je	short b15
 37523 000030A1 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37524 000030A6 7410                    	je	short b15
 37525 000030A8 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37526                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37527                                  	;nop
 37528                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37529                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37530                                  	;nop
 37531                                  	;nop
 37532 000030AA 740C                    	je	short b15
 37533 000030AC 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37534 000030AE 7408                    	je	short b15
 37535 000030B0 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37536 000030B2 7404                    	je	short b15
 37537 000030B4 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37538 000030B6 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37539                                  b15:
 37540 000030B8 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37541 000030BD 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37542                                  b1:
 37543 000030C2 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37544 000030C4 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37545 000030C6 5B                      	pop	bx
 37546 000030C7 C3                      	retn
 37547                                  badnum:
 37548                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37549                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37550 000030C8 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37551                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37552 000030CA 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37553 000030CE 5B                      	pop	bx
 37554 000030CF F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37555 000030D0 C3                      	retn
 37556                                  
 37557                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37558                                  
 37559                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37560                                  
 37561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37562                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37563                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37564                                  ;	si = 0
 37565                                  ;	ax = country id
 37566                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37567                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37568                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37569                                  ;
 37570                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37571                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37572                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37573                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37575                                  
 37576                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37577                                  
 37578 000030D1 57                      	push	di
 37579 000030D2 50                      	push	ax
 37580 000030D3 52                      	push	dx
 37581                                  
 37582 000030D4 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37583 000030D6 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37584 000030D8 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37585 000030DB E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37586 000030DE 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37587                                  
 37588 000030E0 06                      	push	es
 37589 000030E1 56                      	push	si
 37590                                  
 37591 000030E2 0E                      	push	cs
 37592 000030E3 07                      	pop	es
 37593                                  
 37594 000030E4 BF[4833]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37595 000030E7 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37596 000030EA F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37597                                  
 37598 000030EC 5E                      	pop	si
 37599 000030ED 07                      	pop	es
 37600 000030EE 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37601                                  
 37602 000030F0 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37603 000030F3 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37604 000030F6 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37605                                  
 37606 000030F8 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37607 000030F9 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37608 000030FB 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37609 000030FE B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37610 00003101 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37611 00003104 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37612                                  
 37613 00003106 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37614 00003108 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37615 0000310C 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37616                                  
 37617 0000310E 46                      	inc	si
 37618 0000310F 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37619 00003110 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37620 00003111 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37621 00003112 5F                      	pop	di
 37622                                  
 37623                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37624 00003113 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37625 00003116 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37626                                  
 37627                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37628                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37629                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37630 00003118 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 37631 0000311A 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 37632 0000311C 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37633 0000311F 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37634                                  
 37635                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37636 00003121 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37637 00003123 46                      	inc	si
 37638 00003124 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37639 00003125 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37640                                  
 37641                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37642                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37643 00003127 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 37644                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37645 00003128 F9                      	stc
 37646 00003129 C3                      	retn
 37647                                  
 37648                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37649 0000312A 5E                      	pop	si
 37650 0000312B 59                      	pop	cx
 37651 0000312C 5F                      	pop	di
 37652 0000312D EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 37653                                  
 37654                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 37655 0000312F 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 37656                                  
 37657                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 37658 00003132 2E8916[5033]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 37659 00003137 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 37660 0000313A 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 37661 0000313D B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 37662 00003140 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 37663 00003143 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 37664                                  
 37665 00003145 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 37666 00003147 46                      	inc	si
 37667 00003148 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 37668                                  
 37669                                  setdoscntry_data:
 37670 00003149 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37671 0000314A 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 37672 0000314B 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 37673                                  
 37674 0000314C 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 37675 0000314F E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 37676 00003152 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 37677                                  
 37678 00003154 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 37679 00003157 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37680 0000315A B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37681 0000315D F9                      	stc
 37682 0000315E CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37683 00003160 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37684                                  
 37685 00003162 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37686 00003165 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 37687 00003168 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 37688 0000316A F9                      	stc
 37689 0000316B CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 37690 0000316D 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 37691                                  
 37692 0000316F 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37693 00003171 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 37694                                  
 37695 00003173 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 37696 00003176 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37697 00003179 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37698 0000317C F9                      	stc
 37699 0000317D CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 37700 0000317F 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37701                                  
 37702 00003181 56                      	push	si
 37703 00003182 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 37704 00003185 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 37705 00003187 5E                      	pop	si
 37706 00003188 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37707 0000318B 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 37708 0000318E B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 37709 00003190 F9                      	stc
 37710 00003191 CD21                    	int	21h
 37711 00003193 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37712                                  
 37713 00003195 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37714 00003197 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 37715                                  
 37716 00003199 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 37717 0000319C BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 37718 0000319F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 37719 000031A1 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 37720 000031A2 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 37721 000031A3 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 37722 000031A7 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37723                                  
 37724                                  	;if	bugfix
 37725 000031A9 E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 37726                                  	;endif
 37727                                  
 37728 000031AC 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 37729 000031AE 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 37730                                  
 37731 000031B0 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 37732                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 37733 000031B4 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 37734                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 37735                                  	
 37736 000031B8 57                      	push	di			;save di
 37737                                  
 37738                                  	;push	ax
 37739                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 37740                                  	;mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 37741                                  	;pop	ax
 37742                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37743 000031B9 2EFF36[5033]            	push	word [cs:cntrycodepage_id]
 37744 000031BE 8F4404                  	pop	word [si+4]
 37745                                  
 37746                                  setdoscntry_mov:
 37747 000031C1 F3A4                    	rep	movsb			;copy the table into dos
 37748 000031C3 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?
 37749 000031C5 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_data_next
 37750                                  
 37751 000031C7 5F                      	pop	di			;restore di
 37752 000031C8 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 37753                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 37754 000031CC 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 37755                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 37756                                  
 37757                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 37758 000031D0 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 37759 000031D1 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 37760 000031D2 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 37761 000031D3 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 37762 000031D5 46                      	inc	si
 37763 000031D6 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 37764 000031D7 49                      	dec	cx
 37765                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37766 000031D8 741B                    	jz	short setdoscntry_ok 
 37767                                  	;cmp	cx,0
 37768                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_ok
 37769 000031DA E96CFF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 37770                                  
 37771                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37772                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 37773                                  	;retn
 37774                                  
 37775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37776                                  
 37777                                  	;if	bugfix
 37778                                  
 37779                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37780                                  
 37781                                  setdbcs_before_copy:
 37782 000031DD 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?
 37783 000031DF 7514                    	jne	short sdbcsbc		; jump if not
 37784                                  	
 37785                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37786 000031E1 50                      	push	ax
 37787 000031E2 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 37788 000031E4 263905                  	cmp	[es:di],ax ; 0
 37789 000031E7 740B                    	je	short sdbcsbc_pop
 37790                                  	
 37791                                  	;cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 37792                                  	;je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 37793                                  
 37794 000031E9 57                      	push	di
 37795                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37796                                  	;push	ax
 37797 000031EA 51                      	push	cx
 37798 000031EB 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		; load block length
 37799                                  	;add	di,2			; points actual data
 37800 000031EE 47                      	inc	di
 37801 000031EF 47                      	inc	di
 37802                                  	;xor	al,al			; fill bytes
 37803 000031F0 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; clear data block
 37804 000031F2 59                      	pop	cx
 37805                                  	;pop	ax
 37806 000031F3 5F                      	pop	di
 37807                                  
 37808                                  sdbcsbc_pop:	; 10/09/2023
 37809 000031F4 58                      	pop	ax
 37810                                  sdbcsbc:
 37811                                  setdoscntry_ok:	; 18/12/2022
 37812 000031F5 C3                      	retn

 37814                                  	;endif

 37817                                  
 37818                                  getcountrydestination:
 37819                                  
 37820                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37821                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 37822                                  ;
 37823                                  ;input: al - data id
 37824                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37825                                  ;on return:
 37826                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 37827                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 37828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37829                                  
 37830                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37831                                  
 37832 000031F6 51                      	push	cx
 37833                                  	;add	di,74
 37834 000031F7 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 37835                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 37836 000031FA 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 37837 000031FD 47                      	inc	di
 37838 000031FE 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 37839                                  
 37840                                  getcntrydest:
 37841 000031FF 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 37842 00003202 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 37843                                  
 37844 00003204 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 37845 00003208 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 37846                                  
 37847 0000320A 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 37848 0000320D EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 37849                                  
 37850                                  getcntrydest_1:
 37851                                  	;add	di,41
 37852 0000320F 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 37853                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 37854 00003212 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 37855 00003214 F9                      	stc
 37856                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37857                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 37858                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37859 00003215 59                      	pop	cx
 37860 00003216 C3                      	retn
 37861                                  
 37862                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 37863                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37864 00003217 47                      	inc	di
 37865                                  
 37866                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37867                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 37868                                  ;
 37869                                  ;	;inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 37870                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37871                                  
 37872                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37873 00003218 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37874 0000321A 74F9                    	je	short getcntrydest_exit
 37875                                  
 37876                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 37877                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 37878                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37879 0000321C 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 37880                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 37881 0000321F 59                      	pop	cx
 37882 00003220 C3                      	retn
 37883                                  
 37884                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37885                                  
 37886                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37887                                  
 37888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37889                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37890                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37891                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37892                                  ;
 37893                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37894                                  ;	 be moved.
 37895                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37896                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37897                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37898                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37899                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37900                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37901                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37902                                  
 37903 00003221 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37904 00003222 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37905 00003225 F9                      	stc
 37906 00003226 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37907 00003228 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37908 00003229 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37909                                  
 37910 0000322B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37911 0000322D 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37912 0000322F B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37913 00003231 F9                      	stc
 37914 00003232 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37915                                  ricb_exit:
 37916 00003234 C3                      	retn
 37917                                  
 37918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37919                                  
 37920                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 37921                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023 (Retro DOS v4.2)
 37922                                  %if 0
 37923                                  
 37924                                  set_country_path:
 37925                                  
 37926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37927                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37928                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37929                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37930                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37931                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37932                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37933                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37934                                  
 37935                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37936                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37937                                  
 37938                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37939                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37940                                  
 37941                                  	push	si
 37942                                  
 37943                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37944                                  	push	es
 37945                                  	pop	ds
 37946                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37947                                  
 37948                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37949                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37950                                  
 37951                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37952                                  	inc	si
 37953                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37954                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37955                                  
 37956                                  scp_default_drv:
 37957                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37958                                  	int	21h
 37959                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37960                                  
 37961                                  scp_setdrv:
 37962                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37963                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37964                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37965                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37966                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37967                                  
 37968                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37969                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37970                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37971                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37972                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37973                                  
 37974                                  scp_root_dir:
 37975                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37976                                  scp_path:
 37977                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37978                                  
 37979                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37980                                  scpath_exit:
 37981                                  
 37982                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37983                                  	push	es
 37984                                  	pop	ds
 37985                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37986                                  
 37987                                  	pop	si
 37988                                  	retn
 37989                                  
 37990                                  %endif
 37991                                  
 37992                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37993                                  
 37994                                  chk_drive_letter:
 37995                                  
 37996                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37997                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37998                                  ;carry set if not.
 37999                                  
 38000                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38001                                  
 38002 00003235 50                      	push	ax
 38003 00003236 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38004                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38005 00003239 720C                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38006 0000323B 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38007 0000323E 7706                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 38008 00003240 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38009                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38010                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38011                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38012 00003244 7401                    	je	short cdletter_exit
 38013                                  
 38014                                  cdletter_no:
 38015 00003246 F9                      	stc
 38016                                  cdletter_exit:
 38017 00003247 58                      	pop	ax
 38018 00003248 C3                      	retn
 38019                                  
 38020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38021                                  
 38022                                  move_asciiz:
 38023                                  
 38024                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 38025                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 38026                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 38027                                  
 38028                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38029                                  
 38030                                  masciiz_loop:
 38031                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38032 00003249 F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 38033 0000324C A4                      	movsb
 38034                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 38035                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 38036 0000324D 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 38037 0000324F C3                      	retn
 38038                                  
 38039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38040                                  
 38041                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 38042                                  ;
 38043                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 38044                                  
 38045                                  badfil:
 38046 00003250 0E                      	push	cs
 38047 00003251 07                      	pop	es
 38048                                  
 38049 00003252 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 38050                                  badload:
 38051 00003254 BA[9136]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 38052 00003257 BB[4E36]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 38053                                  prnerr:
 38054 0000325A 0E                      	push	cs
 38055 0000325B 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 38056 0000325C E81D00                  	call	print
 38057                                  prn1:
 38058 0000325F 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 38059 00003262 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 38060 00003264 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 38061 00003266 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 38062 00003268 CD21                    	int	21h
 38063 0000326A 46                      	inc	si
 38064 0000326B EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 38065                                  prn2:
 38066 0000326D 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 38067 0000326F E80A00                  	call	print
 38068                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38069                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 38070 00003272 803E[D103]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1 ; suppress line number when handling command.com
 38071                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 38072 00003277 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 38073                                  	
 38074                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38075                                  	;call	error_line
 38076 00003279 E91FF4                  	jmp	error_line
 38077                                  ;prnexit:
 38078                                  	;retn
 38079                                  
 38080                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38081                                  
 38082                                  print:
 38083 0000327C B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 38084 0000327E CD21                    	int	21h
 38085                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 38086 00003280 C3                      	retn
 38087

 38104                                  	;retn

 38124                                  
 38125 00003294 CD21                    	int	21h
 38126                                  
 38127 00003296 F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 38128 00003299 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 38129                                  
 38130 0000329B B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
